loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es:
Rosa Angelica tiene 21 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería,, ubicada en la Provincia de del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, bebidas gaseosas y chichas, también se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pavos y patos) en a parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de un carrito que le permita vender salchipapas y de esta manera facilitara sus ventas, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Angelica is 21 years old and lives with her husband and children in the district of Morropon. It has a hot climate, and the local people mostly earn their living from agriculture, livestock, and trade. It is located in Morropon province, part of the Piura region, on the north coast of Peru.

Rosa Angelica works selling food, carbonated drinks, and chichas (drinks made from maize). She also rears and sells turkeys and ducks in her back yard. She is seeking a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles in order to buy a vending cart. This will allow her to sell salchipapas (a popular fast food dish made up of sausages and French fries), and so make it easier for her to improve her sales and generate a better income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a vending cart to sell sausages and French fries.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru:
Мухаббат замужняя женщина в возрасте 46 лет. Ее муж плотник. У них трое детей. Мухаббат более 5 лет занимается кройкой и шитьем национальной одежды. Данное ремесло досталось ей от ее мамы. Она научила ее всем тонкостям этого ремесла. Уже 5 лет в семье Мухаббат услуга портниха в их семье является важным источником дохода. 
   Мухаббат с семьей в течение многих лет живут в Душанбе. Их дом тоже несколько лет не ремонтировался. Зима пришла очень холодной и тяжелой и поэтому их единственный дом нуждается в ремонте. Но из-за того что они у них нет достаточной суммы денег, чтобы закончить ремонт Мухаббат обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Muhabbat is a 46-year old married woman. Her husband is a carpenter. They have three children. Muhabbat has more than 5 years of experience in cutting and sewing ethnic clothing. She learned this craft from her mother, who taught her all the finer points of sewing. Muhabbat has been a seamstress for five years already, and she provides an important source of income to her family. Muhabbat and her family have lived in Dushanbe for many years. Their house has not been repaired for several years. After a very cold and difficult winter, their only home needs repairs. However, due to the fact that they do not have enough money to finish repairs, Muhabbat has requested a loan.

loans.use: to repair her only home after winter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional charcoal, flour, sugar, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish, meat, pepper, oil, rice, salt, onion, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more candy, biscuits, peanuts, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru: Абдурахим садовник из города Душанбе. Ему 58 лет. Он женат и отец пятерых детей. Трое старших детей уже обзаведены семьями. Младшей дочери 25 лет, она вместе с матерью дома занимается шитьем. А младшему сыну 22 года. Он студент и учится в третьем курсе Таджикского Аграрного Университета в факультете "Гидромелиорация". Его сын с интересом и усердием учится по своей специальности. Он хочет успешно закончить университет и в будущем стать квалифицированным специалистом своей области. В этом году Абдурахим не смог оплатить за учебу сына. Он нуждается в заемных средствах. В связи с этим Абдурахим обратился за кредитом, он надеется на финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Abdurahim is a gardener from Dushanbe. He is 58 years old. He is married and has five children. The three older children have already started their own families. The youngest daughter is 25 years old.  She and her mother are engaged in sewing at home. The youngest son is 22 years old. He is a third year student at the Tajik Agrarian University majoring in "Hydromelioration." His son is studying his specialty with interest and great diligence. He wants to graduate successfully and, in the future, to become an expert in his field. This year, Abdurahim could not pay for his son's tuition. He needs financial means. For this reason, Abdurahim has applied for a loan. He hopes for financial support .

loans.use: to pay for his son's annual university tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a batch of fruit to start trading

loans.name: Yrma

texts.es:
Yrma tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotun, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza al por menor, además a la venta de llonque, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 600 nuevos soles para la compra de cerveza para su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Yrma is 43 years old and lives with her husband and sons in the Oyotun neighborhood, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock, located in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque Region on the north coast of Peru .

She sells beer retail, plus the sale of llonque (a local drink).  Her business is located in her home. She has requested a loan of 2600 soles to buy beer for her business and thus generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy beer for her business and thus generate more income for her family.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: This is 43-year-old Hawa. She is married and has two children aged 16 and 18. In 2002, Hawa established her baby products business. She began her business because she wants to help her husband in taking care of the home. Working seven days a week and seven hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Hawa requires a loan in order to buy more of her baby products for resale. In the future, Hawa plans to educate her children up to university level. She is very hardworking. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more of her baby products for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal and red oil for her business.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo tiene 33 años de edad, solo logro estudiar hasta quinto grado. Actualmente esta acompañado y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales están estudiado, el mayor estudia séptimo grado, el segundo estudia sexto grado y el ultimo esta estudiado primer grado de educación, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficio del hogar. Prácticamente su familia depende del sustento económico que lleva Wilfredo

Wilfredo tiene mucha experiencia en la agricultura, dicho trabajo lo aprendió por necesidad económica ya que no tenia un recurso económico adecuado, el lo aprendió desde muy pequeño. Con este trabajo desea sacar a su familia adelante, ademas Wilfredo aparte del trabajo de agricultor que realiza también se dedica a los que es lo de jornalero en una hacienda que esta cerca de su casa a la cual viaja en bicicleta. Con ambos ingresos desea seguirle dado la educación a sus hijos.

El crédito que ha solicitado lo utilizara para la compara de lamina, clavos y otros materiales para reparar su vivienda, ya que la tiene muy dañada y en el tiempo de invierno su familia se moja, por eso tomo la desicion de sacar un crédito para preparar su casa y que su familia tengan un lugar cálido donde pasar el invierno.

Wilfredo sueña con tener una buena casa donde puedan vivir mas estable sus familia y poderles dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 33 years old. He only went to school through the fifth grade. He is now married and has three children, who are in school. The oldest is in seventh grade, the second is in sixth grade, and the youngest is in first grade. His life companion takes care of their home. His family basically depends on the economic sustenance that Wilfredo provides.

Wilfredo has a lot of experience in agriculture. He learned this work out of economic necessity, since he didn't have adequate economic resources. He learned it when he was very young. With this work, he wants to raise his family. Besides this, Wilfredo, in addition to the agricultural work that he does, also does the work of a day laborer at a ranch that is near his house. He travels there by bicycle. With both incomes, he wants to continue educating his children.

He will use the loan that he has applied for to purchase metal sheets, nails, and other materials to repair his home, since it is very damaged, and in the winter his family gets wet. For this reason he made the decision to take out a loan to prepare his house, so that his family will have a warm place to spend the winter.

Wilfredo dreams of having a good house where his family can live more stably and being able to give them everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, nails, and other materials to repair his house.

loans.name: Khatichakhon

texts.ru: Хатичахон местная жительница района Бохтар. Ей 39 лет. Она занята в сфере торговли более трех лет. Ее муж тоже предприниматель. А 17-летний сын и 15-летняя дочь учатся в школе. Хатичахон занимается продажей детской обуви. Ей нравится ее деятельность. Она всегда обслуживает покупателей вежливо и качественно. Хатичахон сейчас собирается привезти сезонный товар, чтобы увеличить количество продаж. Для этой цели она просит кредит, чтобы приобрести сезонную детскую обувь. Она надеется таким образом привлечь больше клиентов и увеличить семейный бюджет.
texts.en: Khatichakhon is a local resident of the Bohtar district. She is 39 years old. She has been engaged in the trade for more than three years. Her husband is also an entrepreneur. And their 17-year-old son and 15-year-old daughter are in school. Khatichakhon sells children's shoes. She loves her work. She always serves her customers politely and efficiently. Now, Khatichakhon is planning to import seasonal merchandise in order to increase the amount of sales. With this goal in mind, she has requested a loan to purchase seasonal children's shoes. In this way, she hopes to attract more customers and increase the family budget.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal children's footwear to expand her trade

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase  ingredient for her restaurant.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
Adrian tiene 30 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, junto a su esposa y sus dos menores hijos en el Caserío de Patacón, una zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, desde hace cuatro años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y pago de mano de obra a jornaleros y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Adrian is 30 years old. He lives in his own house, which is constructed of rustic material, with his wife and their two minor children in the village of Patacón. It is located in a rural zone in the district of Pomahuaca, where the population works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock raising. It is in the province of Jaén, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works in agriculture, particularly in the cultivation of rice. He has been doing this for four years. His wife helps him in this work. He has applied for a loan of 2000 PEN to purchase compost for the maintenance of his coffee plantings and to pay for work from day laborers and in this way to have a timely production to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy compost to maintain his coffee plantings and pay day laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy red oil, salt, pepper, charcoal, and season oil for her business.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Pilar

texts.es:
Mercedes del Pilar tiene 31 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Salitral, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región del mismo nombre, ubicada en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de pescado y abarrotes, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de de variedad de abarrotes como sacos de arroz, aceite y menestras y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes del Pilar is 31 years old and lives with her children in the district of Salitral, a community dedicated to agriculture, animal husbandry and trade, located in the Province of Morropon which is part of the region of the same name, located in Piura region, on the north coast of Peru.

She sells fish and groceries.  Her business is located in her home.  She has requested a loan of 3000 soles to purchase a variety supplies such as bags of rice, oil and beans and with this to grow her business, generating more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety supplies to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy  rice, oil, and onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees.

loans.name: Izabel

texts.es: Izabel es una persona de 39 años de edad, ella y su familia viven  en el municipio de Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán, departamento de Sololá, tiene dos hijos: el primero tiene 17 años de edad estudia primero básico y el segundo tiene 10 años de edad y estudia cuarto grado primaria, Izabel obtiene sus ingresos en la venta de ropa típica y lo hace en la comunidad donde vive y en las comunidades cercanas, ella ve buen mercado para sus productos porque todas la persona viste los trajes típicos que ella vende, tiene más de 5 años de experiencia en la actividad, Izabel  solicita un crédito por un monto de Q. 7,000.00 para comprar más ropa típica  y así tener más surtidos su negocio, los planes de ella es contribuir un poco más en los gastos de la familia.
texts.en:
Izabel is a woman of 39 years of age.  She and her family live in the town of Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan, in the Solola state.  She has two children.  The eldest is 17 ​​years studying basic education and the second is 10 years old and in the fourth grade.

Izabel derives her income from the sale of traditional clothing and sells in the community where she lives and in nearby communities.  She sees a good market for her products because everyone wears the traditional outfits she sells.  She has more than five years of experience in the business.

Izabel has applied for a loan in the amount of 7,000.00 (GTQ) to buy more typical clothes and have more variety in her business.  Her plans is to contribute a little more for the family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase typical clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft drinks, rice, palm oil, and cold water to increase her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more charcoal.

loans.name: Suglo Mbori Buni-Tampion Group

texts.en:
Afishetu belongs to Suglo Mbori Buni-Tampion Women Assosiation who, for the past two years, have been in the business of processing Shea nuts into Shea butter. 

She is a 45-year-old active working woman in her community. Afishetu is married and has 2 children. Her family lives in Tampion, a village in the northern part of Ghana. 

Initially, due to the lack of adequate funds, Afishetu’s dream to increase production and run a shea butter extraction company was bleak.  However,  because of Kiva and Grameen Ghana, the dream is possible.  She requests  9,300.00 GHS to help her fulfill this dream. She will buy 80 bags of Shea nuts, hire labor, and pay for fuel to carry out the Shea butter extraction process. Afishetu sells the butter to companies for export. 

She will be able to earn more income, support her children’s education, look after their health, provide food and  repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy 80 bags of shea nuts, hire labor and pay for fuel to produce shea butter .

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolás tiene 59 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su esposa e hijos en el Caserío la Succha, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz amarillo criollo y café de la variedad catimore, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nicholas is 59 years old, has a stable home with his wife and children in the town of Succha, a rural zone in the district of Santo Tomas, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock, located in the Province of Cutervo which is in the Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

He is engaged in farming especially the cultivation of native yellow corn and coffee of the Catimore variety.  His wife helps him in this work. 

He has requested a loan of 1000 soles to purchase amendments for the maintenance of his coffee crop and thus have a good output to offer his customers.

loans.use: to purchase amendments for the maintenance of his coffee crop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees.

loans.name: Lidubina Maria

texts.es:
Lidubina María tiene 54 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica al alquiler de habitaciones, desde hace 5 años, cuenta con clientes a quienes alquila y le hacen un pago mensual que le permite educar a sus hijos, tiene una familia unida, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de pintura para las paredes de sus habitaciones y de esta manera tener un ambiente agradable para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lidubina Maria is 54 years old and lives with her spouse and children in the district of Pucara, a community of hot weather. Its population is engaged in agriculture, trade and livestock, located in the province of Jaén belonging to the Region Cajamarca, in northern mountains of Peru.

Her business is the rental of rooms.  She has been doing this for 5 years.  She counts on customers who rent and make a monthly payment that allows her to educate her children and have a close family.

She has requested a loan of 1000 soles for the purchase of paint for the walls of the rooms and thus have a friendly atmosphere for her clients.

loans.use: to buy paint for the walls of her rental rooms.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to clean his 2.5 acres of mature cacao trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding, grafted cacao seedlings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to clean his cacao farm

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more goods to sell at his grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding, grafted cacao seedlings.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en: Gregorio is a certified organic cacao farmer of Maya Mountain Cacao. He lives in the beautiful village of Santa Rosa along the southern highway. He is a father of 11 children. He currently has 4 acres of mature cacao trees producing 150-175 lbs. of cacao every two weeks. However, he has difficulty in cleaning his huge cacao patch; therefore, he is requesting a loan so that he could properly maintain it. He envisions, in the future, to expand more into the cacao business by planting more cacao trees for the benefit of the market and his family.

loans.use: to clean his 4 acres of mature cacao trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to clean his cacao trees.

loans.name: Jeneba

texts.en: This is 43 year-old Jenneh.  She is married, and has 5 children ages 23, 21,18,15 and 12. She also has 1 additional dependent who lives with her because of schooling.  In 2002, Jenneh established her clothing and textiles business. She began her business because she wants to help her husband take care of the home. Working 7 days a week and 10hrs hours a day, she earns about Le 600,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000. Jenneh requires a loan in order to buy more clothing of different kinds for resale. In the future, Jenneh plans to educate her children unto university level and to build a house. She is  very hard working  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: in order to buy more clothing of different kinds for resale

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: This is 33 year-old Hawa.  She is Married, and has 1 child, age 13. She has 3 additional dependents, who live with her. In 2005, Hawa established her baby products business. She began her business because she wants to help her husband take care of the home. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le7,000,00 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le3,000,000. Hawa requires a loan in order to buy more baby products for resale. In the future, Hawa plans to educate her children unto university level and to build a house. She is very hard working  and thanks you for your support.

loans.use: buy more baby products for resale

loans.name: Ameth De Jesus

texts.en: Ameth de Jesus is a Kubo client and this is his story: Ameth is married and is 56 years old. He owns a popsicle franchise where he distributes popsicles to sellers. Currently he has eight sellers. He asks for this loan to invest it in a new franchise. His achievement is support his family and his challenge is improving his sellers and become the best distributor of popsicles in his area.

loans.use: to acquire a popsicles franchise

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María Magdalena tiene 54 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Morropon una comunidad de clima calurosa, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños cuenta con clientela por los caseríos aledaños, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de ropa de temporada para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena, 54, lives with her family in Morropon district of the province of Morropon.  This area is located in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.  It has a warm climate and its people work mostly in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Maria sells clothes for women, men and children.  She has customers from all the surrounding villages.  She has asked for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of seasonal clothes to offer her customers.  This will help her to generate more of an income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of seasonal clothes to offer her customers.

loans.name: Glory Stella

texts.en:
Glory Stella is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 44 years old and has one child who is in school.

Glory Stella has a pig raising business in the Philippines. Glory Stella requested a PHP 29000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Glory Stella has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Glory Stella would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Reshyl

texts.en:
Reshyl is 28 years old with 3 children, one of whom in school. Reshyl works very hard to provide for them.

Reshyl's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines November 8, 2013. Reshyl has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Reshyl has taken a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using the this loan purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Reshyl is committed to rebuild her devastated life and in future would like to save enough to provide a secure future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 44 years old, married and has 5 children who are in school. 

Evelyn and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Evelyn is taking out a housing loan amounting to Php 8,500 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Evelyn has been an NWTF borrower since 2013. She plans to recover through her buying and selling fish business.

With your help, Evelyn can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish to increase her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase high yielding grafted cacao trees

loans.name: Gilmer Edgardo

texts.es:
Gilmer Edgardo tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Nueva Arica, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de limpieza agrícola mediante el “arado”, actividad que consiste en unir a dos yuntas del mismo tamaño mediante una herramienta llamada arado que permite remover la tierra para el cultivo, junto a su esposa también se dedican a la crianza de animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio.

Gilmer ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 500 nuevos soles para la compra de una vaca lechera y de esta manera ordeñar su leche y ofrecerlo a sus clientes, lo que le generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Gilmer Edgardo, 52, lives with his wife and children in the Nueva Arica district of the province of Chiclayo.  It is located in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.  It has a changeable climate and its people work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Gilmer offers an agricultural service to prepare the earth using his plough.  This plough is attached to a pair of oxen of the same size and turns the soil to prepare it for sewing.  Together with his wife he also raises small animals at the back of his house.

He has asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 2,500 nuevos soles to buy a dairy cow so he can obtain fresh milk and sell it to his customers.  This will help him to generate more of an income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow so he can sell fresh milk.

loans.name: Ricart

texts.es:
Ricart tiene 48 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa tienen una bodega donde ofrecen variedad de productos de primera necesidad como sacos de arroz, menestras, aceite entre otros, también se dedican a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, pavos y cuyes, para posteriormente ofrecerlos en el mercado de su distrito.

Tiene una familia unida que se esfuerza por tener una mejor calidad de vida, Ricart ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de abarrotes para abastecer su bodega y poder ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ricart, 48, lives with his wife and son in the Querocotillo district in the province of Cutervo.  This area is located in the Cajamarca mountain region in northern Peru.  The climate is changeable and the people work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Together with his wife, Ricart has a grocery store where they sell basic products for the home, such as bags of rice, vegetables and oil amongst other things.  They also raise small animals such as chickens, turkeys and guinea pigs, which they later sell in the local market.

They are a close family and together they strive for a better living.  Ricart has asked for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of groceries to stock his store and offer more products to his customers.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to stock his grocery store.

loans.name: Mylene Mely

texts.en:
Mylene Mely works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family.

With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Mylene Mely would like to expand her business and help her husband to generate income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 42 years old and married with two children. Josephine works very hard to provide for them.

Josephine runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, seasonings, cereals, coffee, sugar, shampoo, detergent soap, etc. to sell.

Josephine has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, seasonings, cereals, coffee, sugar, shampoo, detergent soap, etc., and she earns additional income from food vending.

In the future, Josephine would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, seasonings, cereals, coffee, sugar, shampoo, detergent soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Charlita

texts.en:
Charlita is 52 years old and married with 3 children, one of whom is in school. Charlita works very hard to provide for them.

Charlita's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Charlita has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

She has taken out a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to rebuild her family home.

Charlita is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her child to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for bags of rice, sugar, provisions and drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more ladies' handbags for her business.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is 40 years old and married. She has 5 children, 4 of whom are in school.

Angelita and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

She is taking out a housing loan amounting to PHP 7,500 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Angelita has been an NWTF borrower since 2013, and she plans to repay this loan through her general store business.

With your help, Angelita can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Christian Alexander

texts.es: Christian tiene 20 años de edad y habita ne casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Él es un joven con espíritu emprendedor quien  desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al comercio de ropa y cristalería (vasos y platos). Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante en las diferentes zonas de su localidad y es así como logra ganarse la vida y colaborar con los gastos del hogar. ÉL ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como variedad de ropa (faldas, blusas, pantalones, vestidos, etc) y cristalería ( tasas platos, vasos, etc.) con el fin de llegar a un numero mayor de clientes que le permita aumentar sus ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Christian 20, lives in his own home with his family.  He is a young man with an entrepreneurial spirit who has been selling clothing and glassware (glasses and plates) for some time.  He works as a street vendor in different areas of his town and earns a living this way to help cover household expenses.

He has decided to request a loan through FUSAI to buy a variety of clothing (skirts, blouses, pants, dresses, etc.) and glassware (cups, saucers, glasses, etc.) in order to attract more customers so he can increase his sales and income.

loans.use: To buy clothing (skirts, blouses, pants, dresses, etc.) and glassware (cups, saucers, glasses, etc.)

loans.name: Lila

texts.en:
Lila is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 2 years, and also earns additional income from food vending.

Lila has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Ana Miriam

texts.es: Ana tiene 60 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ana se gana la vida por medio de la venta de tortas, panes, bebidas gaseosas y golosinas. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es como lleva el sustento a su familia y apoya con los gastos del hogar. Ana desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de insumos para el negocio como: panes, jamón, lechuga, tomates, golosinas y bebidas. De esta forma espera mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos con el fin de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Ana, 60, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She earns a living selling cakes, breads, beverages, sodas and sweets.  This business is her main source of income, allowing her to support the family and help with household expenses.  

Ana wants to invest in her business and buy goods such as breads, ham, lettuce, tomatoes, sweets and beverages.  She is hoping to improve sales and income so she can give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy breads, ham, lettuce, tomatoes, sweets, and beverages for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm supplies and fertilizers to grow coffee.

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Créer Le 07 Mai 2009, ce groupe est composé de femmes très actives dans l’agriculture de leur village, elles sont d’une solidarité sans faille. Elles se sont engagées dans le petit  commerce afin de réduire les obstacles à l’obtention des produits de consommation courante.

Madame Adama (assise à l’extrême droite avec la une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants dont un garçon et une fille, elle est une femme très dynamique dans le banc villageois car ayant adhérer depuis le début. Son activité s’inscrit dans la vente de produits de consommation comme l’huile de palme, le sucre, des bouillons et divers condiments.

 Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter : 02 sacs de sucre à 25 000 F CFA l’un, 03 bidons d’huile raffiné à 17 000 F CFA l’unité et 02 bidons de 20 litre d’huile de palme à 20 000 F CFA l’un.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de mieux prendre soins de ses enfants sur le plan sanitaire et éducatif et surtout de soutenir son mari dans la gestion quotidienne du foyer.
texts.en:
This group was created on 7 May 2009, and is made up of women members who are all very involved in agriculture.  They are very supportive of one another and work to reduce the difficulties of obtaining food products locally.

Adama (sitting on the far right of the photo with her hand raised) is the group representative and has been a member since the beginning.  She is married and has two children, a girl and a boy. She sells consumer goods such as palm oil, sugar, bouillon cubes and various other food products.  

Adama plans to use her loan to buy two sacks of sugar at 25,000 francs CFA each, three drums of refined oil at 17,000 francs CFA each, and two  20-litre drums of palm oil at 20,000 francs CFA each.  She will use her profits to provide more for the health and education of her children, and also to help her husband provide for the expenses of their household.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of sugar, 3 drums of  refined oil and 2 drums of 20 litres of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Zulman Alena

texts.es: Zulman tiene 46 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 2 años, 6 años y 15 años de edad. Zulman se gana la vida por medio de la venta de ropa y cosméticos de forma ambulante. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien desea dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Zulman solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y lámina galvanizada para encementar el piso de la vivienda y para construir una galera para el área de lavadero. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Zulman, 46, lives in her own house with her husband and their three children, ages two, six and 15.  She earns a living selling clothing and cosmetics on a door to door basis.  She is a very hard worker who wants to give her family the best living conditions possible.

Zulman is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel and metal sheeting to put down a cement floor in her home and to build a laundry area.  She hopes to receive this financing so she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, gravel and metal sheeting to put down cement flooring and build a laundry area.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy peanuts and cold water to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, milk, and peanuts for her business.

loans.name: Budhimaa Group

texts.en:
In 2008, six women from Tukla village, located in the Khariar block of Nuapada district, one of the poorest district of India, stepped out and decided to build a secure future for their family with their contributions. They formed a group named Budhima to avail credit from Mahashakti Foundation for development of their existing businesses. 

Hemakanti is standing in the middle with her hand raised in the photo. She is 44 years old and living with her husband and one son, 22, and two daughters (18 and 16 years of age) who help in her business. Hemakanti hails from a traditional cloth-weaving community. For the last 30 years, she has been running a cloth weaving business with her husband. Now, she has two handlooms for weaving saris. Her husband purchases the yarn/thread from a trader in a village 20 kms away.  80 to 100 pieces are prepared from a bundle of yarn, which costs around 10,000-15,000 rupees. Hemakanti does the initial processing of the thread to make it ready for weaving and after that, her husband and son fit it to the handloom and weave saris. They only weave saris because of the demand in the market. Her family works around 8-10 hours a day and weaves one piece of sari from each handloom. Hemakanti sells her products to the local traders on a weekly basis. She earns a monthly income of Rs.6,000, which is not sufficient to maintain her family. 

With the present loan, she wants to buy thread/yarn in bulk. Purchasing more stock at a time will help her to reduce the purchasing and transportation costs for raw material. Hemakanti wishes to grow her business and save enough to complete the construction of her half-onstructed house.

Ambika(s), Rukmani, Urmila, Chhabi and Ambika (G) are the five other members of the group. They have a cloth weaving business, a business making and selling sweet and salty items and a Tiffin Hotel business.

loans.use: To purchase thread/yarn in bulk.

loans.name: Phea

texts.en:
Phea is 41 years of age, married and is blessed with three children. She has owned and managed a farm for almost 15 years, earning an income of about KHR 15,000 per day. Her income is usually used for daily food and expenses at home.

Now, Phea is requesting a loan to purchase construction supplies to make some home improvements. This will bring them comfortable living conditions and improve their quality of life. A big thanks goes to Kiva lenders who donate their funds to enable poor families to overcome the hardships in their lives.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies to make some home improvements

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

Julie has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 5,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs so that she can build a house for her family.

With your help Julie will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Wella

texts.en:
Wella is 22 years old, married and has two children. Wella and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Wella is taking out a housing loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs to build a house for her family. 

Wella has been an NWTF borrower since 2013. She plans to recover through her sari-sari store business.

With your help, Wella can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes works hard to support her family. Lourdes is married and has a buy and sell used clothing business in the Philippines. Lourdes has been in this business for nine years now.

Lourdes requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more used clothing to sell to her customers.

Lourdes would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothing to sell to her customers

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Beatriz works hard to support her family.

Beatriz has a food vending business in the Philippines. Beatriz is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Beatriz has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Jay Maa Mangala Group

texts.en:
Gunadei, an active married lady of 28, is a resident of a rural village named Badi in Nuapada district of Odisha, India. The lady standing with her hand raised in the photograph is Gunadei. She resides with her husband and two sons (9 & 6) years old. Her two children are studying in fourth and third standard in a private school. To increase the income of her family, in the year 2009, Gunadei, along with four other like minded women of her locality, formed a group named Jay Maa Mangala and has taken a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. This is the fourth loan for her.

Gunadei has been running a fancy store with ladies' fancy items and cosmetics in her house for the last eight years. She basically sells items like bangles, talc, combs, oil; face creams, plastic items, cosmetics etc. She started this business with a small investment of 5,000 INR of her own.money.  At that time, she was used to selling fancy items along with stationary items. Due to Good behavior and the politeness of Gunadei, her business was running well. Gunadei was very much interested in expanding her business, but a lack of finances was a hindrance for her. At that time, Mahashakti Foundation started its operation in that area and it was a blessing for her. Immediately, she motivated three other women, formed a group and took a loan for the expansion of her business. In the meantime, she has already taken four loans and fully repaid them with proper investment and development of her enterprise. 

Now, she has converted her business into fancy items and bangles. Presently, she earns a monthly income of 5,000 INR. This is not at all sufficient for her to manage the house and educate her children. She wants to increase the volume of her business to earn some extra income. So from the present loan of 40,000 INR, she has purchased a variety of bangles, fancy items and cosmetics from the nearest market in bulk. Gunadei is confident that this investment will give her more income. She hopes for the better education of her two sons and construction of a good house.

The other three members of the group are Janani, Mithila and Koushly who run a general store, noodle manufacturing and fish business, respectively.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of bangles, fancy items and cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase inventory and renew equipment

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Estelita works hard to support her family.

She has a business direct selling perfumes and clothing in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Estelita is borrowing PHP 7000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her business of direct selling perfumes and clothing.

Estelita has sustained her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to purchase additional meat and other ingredients for her food vending business. Delia has been in this business for three years. Delia earns additional income from selling fertilized duck eggs.

Delia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She hopes to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional meat and other ingredients

loans.name: Hoern's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village of the Ponhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province, Hoern is aged fifty-nine and married. She has one child. To support the family, she and her husband have been growing cassava. The current business earns her family about 34,700 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
Hoern joined VisionFund in this loan cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. She is going to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita is thirty-five and married with three children in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Marita has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Marita has been in this business for one year. In the future, Marita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jairo Manuel

texts.es: Jairo Manuel es una persona de 39 años de edad, casado que habita en barrio Tamanes. Desde varios años trabajo en el área técnica de la Alcaldía de su municipio, desempeñando el cargo de urbanístico, el cual le ha permitido poder adquirir mucha experiencia en el área de construcción. Jairo solicita el crédito que cambiar el techo de sus casa de habitación, quien no presta las condiciones de habitarla en época de invierno, lo años anteriores sus niños se han enfermado dadas las circunstancia del mismo. El comprará zinc de buena calidad, perlines de hierro y pagará la mano de obra de dicha construcción.
texts.en:
Jairo Manuel is 39 years old, married, and lives in the neighbourhood of Tamanes. He has worked for a number of years in the technical area of the municipal mayor's office, in town planning, which has allowed him to gain a lot of experience in the field of construction. 

Jairo is requesting the loan to change the roof of his home, which is uninhabitable during winter. In previous years, his children got ill because of this. He wants to buy high-quality zinc and metal girders, and pay for the manpower for this construction.

loans.use: to buy high-quality zinc and metal girders, and pay for the manpower for this construction.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca tiene la edad de 45 años, madre soltera de dos hijos los cuales ya son independientes, se siente muy orgullosa de ser Nicaragüense, sangre pinolera por gracia de Dios, donde ha crecido con las costumbres de su pueblo Sauceño, al igual de ser madre soltera y de haber criado con su esfuerzo y sudor de su frente a sus dos hijos sin la ayuda del padre.
Se preparó como Psicóloga y es encargada de la administración de un centro infantil donde hay niños de todas las edades que son abandonados por sus padres a los cuales se les da cariño, educación y alimentación.
Es una mujer con un don especial que posee de paciencia y carisma y que transmite a estos niños desamparados.
Francisca en este momento está solicitando un préstamo a los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel se lo financien para la compra de medicamentos y realización de exámenes médicos, ya que últimamente se ha sentido mal de salud con el fin de mejorar y así no fallarles a sus niños.
texts.en:
Francisca is 45 years old. She is the single mother of two children who are on their own. She is very proud of being Nicaraguan, with Pinolero blood, thank God. She grew up with the customs of her people in the town of Sauceño, and as a single mother she raised her two children with the sweat of her brow with no help from their father. 

She studies psychology and she is in charge of a children's center where there are children of all ages who have been abandoned by their parents. She gives them affection, education and food. She is a woman who has the special gift of patience and charisma that she transmits to these homeless children. 

At this time, Francisca is asking for a loan fro the Kiva investors so that  through Ceprodel she can finance the purchase of medications and have some medical tests. Lately, she has felt herself to be in poor health and she wants to get better and not let her children down.

loans.use: to purchase medications and have some medical tests.

loans.name: Lilliam Damarys

texts.es: Lilliam se dedica al comercio de venta de quesillos en su casa de habitación, es madre soltera con 3 hijos, dos varones y una niña, todos estudiantes. Lilliam solicita el crédito porque desea invertir en pagar los derechos para poder instalar los servicios nuevo de agua potable y energía eléctrica en su vivienda que está en construcción, para ella es muy importante esta inversión ya que dicho servicio es de vital importancia en el hogar, sobre todo para cuidar la salud de los niños.
texts.en: Lilliam makes a living selling quesillos, corn tortillas with cheese, in her home. She is a single mother with three children, two boys and a girl, who all go to school. Lilliam is requesting the loan because she wants to invest in paying the fees to install new drinking water and electricity services in her home, which is undergoing construction. This investment is very important to her, since these services are of vital importance in the home, above all to look after the health of the children.

loans.use: to pay for the fees to install new drinking water and electricity services and to buy pipes and wiring.

loans.name: Fredy Ernesto

texts.es: Fredy tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, hija de 8 años y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Fredy  trabaja como empleado en una empresa de zapatos cercana a su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Él desea mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica en su vivienda y para construir un muro de retención para lo cual necesita materiales como: ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro.
texts.en:
Fredy is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his partner, eight-year-old daughter and four-year-old son. Freddy is employed at a footwear company near where he lives. This is how he makes a living and supports his family. 

He wants to improve his family's living conditions, which is why he has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in installing electricity in his home and build a retaining wall, for which he needs materials such as bricks, sand, cement and metal.

loans.use: to install electricity and to buy bricks, sand, cement and metal to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Santos Mario De Jesus

texts.es: Santos tiene 62 años de edad y se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra como: plástico, hierro y papel. De esta forma se gana la vida honradamente  y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Santos desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de su vivienda y para instalar la energía eléctrica. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lamina galvanizada, madera, clavos y pagará por la instalación de la energía eléctrica dado que no cuenta con el servicio. Espera poder contar con este apoyo y así dar inicio lo antes posible a las mejoras.
texts.en: Santos is 62 years old and works buying and selling scrap such as plastic, metal and paper. This is how he makes a living in an honest way and supports his household. Santos wants to improve his living conditions which is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in repairing the roof of his home and install electricity. He will use the amount he is requesting to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails, and to install electricity as he does not yet have it. He hopes to receive this support and in this way, begin the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails, and to install electricity.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, hija de 8 años y su hijo de 17 años de edad. Marcos se dedica a la venta de tostadas de plátano, churros y papas fritas desde hace mucho tiempo. de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Marcos desea mejorar las condiciones del techo de la vivienda y cercar el terreno para proteger sus pocas pertenencias y dar mayor seguridad a su familia. Por lo  anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI  para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre  para reparar el techo de la vivienda y para cercar el terreno.
texts.en: Marcos is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his life's companion, his 8 year old daughter and his 17 year old son. Marcos has worked selling plantain tostadas, churros and french fries for a long time. This is how he earns his living and supports his home. Marcos wants to improve the roof on his home and fence in the property to protect his few belongings and give his family more security. To do this, he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, wood, nails, and wire to repair the roof and fence in the property.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, nails and wire to repair the roof on his house and to fence in his property.

loans.name: Jose Napoleon

texts.es:
En señor José un hombre luchador de 57 años es casado mantiene una sólida y larga relación la esposa es muy emprendedora y le gusta el trabajo en el campo ella le ayuda mucho en el negocio de los cerdos y a la ganadería, de estos negocios aprendió en su niñez junto con los papas ya que fueron criados en una finca, sus padres son de bajos recursos económicos lo que les impidió estudiar, ellos solo tienen primaria, a estos negocios le dedican  un promedio de 8 horas diarias 
Él vive y tiene el negocio en el Recinto Bernardo Valdivieso un recinto de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora, es un lugar muy tranquilo donde se puede descansar ya que está alejado del pueblo y de todos sus problemas 
Don José solicita este crédito para invertir en una pequeña tienda que tienen en casa, con esta inversión mejorara sus ingresos económicos y calidad de vida, José agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
Señor José is a hard-working, 57-year old man who is married and has a solid and long-standing relationship with his wife. She is very enterprising and likes working outdoors. She helps him out a lot with his pig and livestock rearing business. José learned how to carry out these activities as a boy with his parents, as they grew up on a farm. Their parents have very little money, which prevented José and his wife from studying any further than primary school. They spend eight hours a day working on their business.

José lives and has his business in Bernardo Valdivieso, an area with a warm, wet climate full of friendly and hard-working people. It is a very peaceful place where you can relax as it is far away from the town and all its problems.

José is requesting this loan to invest in a small shop in his home. This investment will boost his earnings and improve his quality of life. José is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and opportunities they give.

loans.use: to invest in a small grocery store.

loans.name: Silvia Beatriz

texts.es: Silvia tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 años y 10 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de mariscos. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como colabora con la economía del hogar. Silvia desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda dado que el techo y las paredes están deterioradas por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera y adobes. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y dar inicio a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Silvia is 28 years old and lives in her own home with her partner and two children aged aight and ten. She makes a living buying and selling seafood. She has been a mobile seller of this for a long time, and this is how she contributes to supporting her family. 

Silvia wants to improve the condition of her home, because the roof and walls are damaged. This is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, nails, wood and abode. She hopes that she receives this funding and can begin the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, wood and abode to repair the roof and walls of her home.

loans.name: Tserenkhorloo

texts.en:
Tserenkhorloo, 35 years old, lives with her husband and children in Kherlen, the easternmost city of Mongolia. She has been working as a hair dresser for eleven years. Her husband renders taxi service to local people. Their children go to high school. 

She is requesting a loan of $1,650 to install vacuum-insulated windows in her house. As a result, dust and debris will no longer make their way into the house, and the windows will be well-insulated to reduce heat loss. If the house doesn't lose its heat, the family won't need to burn coal for heating. Burning of coal is considered a main contributor to air pollution.

loans.use: to install vacuum-insulated windows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase metal inventories to produce a large quantity of products to sell to local residents

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase material to build an eco-friendly insulated wooden house to meet a client's order on time

loans.name: 02 Trường Thi Group

texts.en:
Oanh is 36 years old and she is married with two  children. She lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. She has a retail business selling coal. She has been involved in this business for seven years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase coal for resale.

She is the leader of a 6-member group, the 02 Trường Thi solidarity group. This is Oanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. In the future, she hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase coal for resale

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Mrs. Oanh has a service business cutting hair. She has been involved in this business for 8 years. She is 25 years old and married with 2 children. She lives with 2 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Oanh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid 2 loans from them. The main hardship that Oanh faces in her life is not having a clean water system or a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick… to build a toilet.

In the future, Oanh hopes to buy a motorbike, for her business to do well, and to travel on vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of well-designed affordable clothing to sell at her rental stall.

loans.name: Estrellita

texts.en:
Estrellita is 28 years old and has two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell.

She has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from fish vending.

Estrellita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell

loans.name: Kleber Raul

texts.es:
Recinto Pueblo Nuevo un lugar de clima cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora en este Recinto como tradición tiene las festividades del mismo por cumplir un año más y las fiestas en honor al divino niño, en este pequeño recinto vive el señor Kleber un hombre luchador de 40 años actualmente es padre soltero tiene una pequeña hija de 6 años tuvo una mala relación con la esposa lo que los llevo a la separación, la hija vive con ella y el solo la puede ver los fines de semana y en esos días aprovecha al máximo para compartir buenos momentos con la niña, él es albañil de profesión y le gusta el negocio de los cerdos por lo que solicita el crédito para emprender en este negocio. 
Con esta inversión espera mejorar sus ingresos económicos para darle un mejor futuro a su hija ya que al no poder estar en casa con ella tratara de darle todo lo que necesita para que se pueda preparar, el señor Kleber agrade a Fundación Alternativa y  Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
Kleber lives in Pueblo Nuevo, an area with a warm and wet climate full of friendly and hard-working people. This area holds a traditional festival to celebrate its continued existence every year, and in honour of the divine child. Señor Kleber lives in this small community. He is a hard-working man aged 40, and is currently a single father. He has a young daughter aged 6. He had an unhappy relationship with his wife, and so they separated. His daughter lives with her and he only sees her at weekends. He makes the most of those days to share happy moments with his little girl. He is a builder by trade and he likes the pig-rearing industry, which is why he is requesting a loan to set up his own business.

With this investment, he hopes to increase his earnings to offer his daughter a better future, since because he can't be at home with her he will try to give her everything she needs growing up. Señor Kleber is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and  Kiva for the support and opportunities they give.

loans.use: capitalize and start up his pig-rearing business.

loans.name: Saram's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village in Siem Reap province’s Srey Snom district, Saram is aged 49 years and married with eight children. To make a living and support her big family, Saram and her husband have been farming rice as their primary business for 30 years, and they supplement their income by working as construction workers. 

This is the first micro-loan for Saram’s group with VisionFund. Saram is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and will use a portion of it to spend on laborers. With this loan, she hopes to cultivate her rice to earn more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Seng's Group

texts.en:
Seng is aged 45 years and married with five children, living in a rural village of Siem Reap province’s Srey Snom district. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and growing cassava, which they have been doing for 14 years. The current business earns them about 16,000KHR per day and they manage to save about 10,000KHR each day for future needs. 

Seng’s group consists of two female members and she is with VisionFund just for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to pay for plowing the field. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for plowing the field.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Maria Clara

texts.es: María tiene 52 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar y desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de tortillas. La venta la realiza en su hogar de habitación y gracias a su experiencia y buen trato a los clientes ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada día la prefieren más. Con el fin de seguir  manteniendo su negocio activo por mucho tiempo y continuar satisfaciendo a sus clientes con las ricas tortillas que ella ofrece a decidido solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de maíz y cal al por mayor para reguardar para el invierno y no quedarse desabastecida.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old and lives in her own home with her family. For many years, she has made a living selling tortillas. She sells them from her home and thanks to her experience and good customer service, she has been able to win the trust of many people who, day by day, choose her tortillas over others. 

In order to keep her business active for a long time to come and continue to satisfy her customers with the delicious tortillas she offers, she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying corn and lime in bulk to stock up for winter and not run out of supplies.

loans.use: to buy corn and lime in bulk for her tortilla business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 56 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida quien es jornaleo y junto a sus dos hijos de 18 años y 20 años de edad. María se gana la vida  por medio de la compra y venta de maíz y tiene mucho tiempo de contar con este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día le demandan más el producto. Con el fin de abastecerse en tiempo de invierno y seguir manteniendo su negocio y satisfaciendo a sus clientes ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compara de maíz al por mayor para la venta. Espera poder contar  con este financiamiento y así asegurar su mercadería para la venta dado que este negocio es el que le permite cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old and lives in her own home with her partner, who is a labourer, and her two children aged 18 and 20. María makes a living through the buying and selling of corn, and has had this business for a long time, which is why she has a lot of customers who ask for more products every day. 

In order to stock up in time for winter and continue running her business and satisfying her customers, she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying wholesale corn to sell. She hopes that she can receive this funding and in this way, ensure her merchandise for sale given that this business is what allows her to pay her household expenses.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn to sell.

loans.name: Hường

texts.en:
Mrs. Hường works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.  Hường is 25 years old and is married.  She has one child.  She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hường's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Hường has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Hường faces in her life is not having a latrine, so her family shares a neighbor's latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Hường hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet

loans.name: Saren

texts.en:
Saren is 34 years old and married, with three teenaged children who are attending school. She and her husband are involved in agriculture, farming rice to be financially stable in order to secure the overall needs of their family. They have been doing this for almost 20 years, and earn additional income from being paid workers locally.

Having inadequate capital for making some home improvements, Saren would like to avail herself of a loan of USD1,000 to buy construction materials like cements, bricks, sand and paint. This will bring them comfortable living conditions and improve their quality of life. Big thanks to Kiva lenders who donate their funds to enable poor families to overcome the hardships in their lives.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like cements, bricks, sand and paint, for home improvements.

loans.name: Joylin

texts.en:
Joylin is 35 years old.  She is married and has three children. She is a woman full of dreams for her family. She loves her family and that's why she works hard for her business with the help of her husband. She has managed her fish selling for eight years. To have additional income, she is asking for a loan amounting to Php 48,000 to buy additional fish. 

In the future, Joylin hopes that she can achieve her dreams to give a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy additional fish for her business

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.en:
Ernesto previously accessed an 20,000 PHP loan that he utilized to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in his business. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. He would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add in his inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain their daily needs and his children's educational expenses. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. Ernesto hopes to be more successful in business and dreams to have his own big company. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in his business.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 55 years old and married.  She has two children. She works very hard to provide for them.  Myrna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc.  Myrna has been in this business for two years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell

loans.name: Santoshi 'b' Group

texts.en:
Duajhar is a rural village of the Nuapada district in Odisha, India. In the year 2013, six active women entrepreneurs of this village formed a group named Santoshi B to access a loan from Mahashakti Foundation to expand their existing businesses. Santoshi is one of them. The lady standing second from right with raised hand in the photo is Santoshi. She is an energetic young lady of 27 years who lives with her husband, one son of three years, her father-in-law and mother-in-law. 

Santoshi has been running a rice huller and rice flakes-making machine in her village for 15 years. Her husband manages this unit. People from a five-mile radius come to this place for rice husking and rice flakes making. She earns a monthly net income of 8,000 INR from the existing businesses. Out of this income she has been able to manage her household expenses in a decent manner. So Santoshi is planning to increase her income by expanding the business. Looking into the demand of the locality, from the present loan of 48,000 INR Santoshi wants to buy another rice huller to give better service to the customers. She is certain that this will generate a handsome income for her because in a radius of five miles this type of facility is not available.

Santoshi hopes to save enough money to construct a good house and give better education to her son.

The other five members of the group, Kumudini, Bhabita, Maharagi, Umakanti and Supta, are doing a tent house business, a sweet making unit, a fruits stall, etc.

loans.use: To pay for purchasing a rice huller.

loans.name: Amber

texts.en:
Ever since she started walking, Amber loved to dance. At age 13, she started student teaching dance classes and at 15 she was already coaching competitive teams. Amber has taught all types of dance for over 18 years at studios throughout Southern California. 

For many years, Amber drove by a beautiful ballroom studio and dreamed of someday owning it. She always wanted to start her own studio but it just never seemed like the right time. That all changed however, when she one day saw a "for lease" sign out in front of her dream studio. 

Amber and her husband, Rudolph, (pictured right) decided to take the plunge and signed the lease for the future home of The Movement Dance Studio. She already has a loyal following of students from the various classes she has taught around the city, and she hopes that her brand new state-of-the-art facility will attract even more high-caliber students. According to Amber, many of the top, reputable dance studios are in North County San Diego, and so she wants to offer the same caliber of training at a more central location. She also hopes that her studio's more central location will allow more low- to middle-income families to experience the joys of dance. 

Though everything is moving along smoothly, Amber is still in need of some start-up capital to launch her new studio. She will use her $7,500 Kiva loan to finish building out her studio and help pay for her first few months’ rent. Hoping to provide a variety of creative options for her students, Amber needs a studio that can accommodate every type of dance from jazz and tap to ballet and hip-hop. 

Amber hopes to grow The Movement Dance Studio to at least 300 students over the next five years. Her fiery passion for dance drives her to push through the challenges of being an entrepreneur to spread her passion to others.

loans.use: to finish building out her studio and help pay for her first few months’ rent.

loans.name: Kunthea

texts.en:
Kunthea is 44 years old. She and her husband, together with their three children, are currently residing in a rural area of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. Kunthea puts all of her effort into agribusiness to financially support her family and educate their children. She has a great help from her husband and children. She has been a rice farmer for more than 25 years.

Kuthea needs this financial support in order to improve water and sanitation for her household. She realizes that this will play an important role for healthy living conditions. The loan amount will be used to dig a well of concrete rings to ensure enough water supplies for daily consumption. Thanks to Hattha Kaksekar's new water loan program with a special rate, Kuthea is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, safeguarding her family's health and protecting the environment.

loans.use: to dig a well of concrete rings to ensure enough water supplies for daily consumption.
