texts.es: Martha es una humilde trabajadora que se ha desempeñado en oficio de la confección desde hace más de 30 años, donde según ella tuvo la fortuna de encontrarse con un gran jefe y le da muchas gracias a dios por todo lo que él hizo por ella, su historia como micro-empresaria tiene lugar hace aproximadamente 18 años cuando trabajaba en una empresa y le manifestó a su jefe que quería ser una persona independiente y este de gran corazón le ofreció una máquina y le dijo “ mira lleva esta máquina plana si la vendes podrás comprar otras dos y con eso iniciaras tu negocio, ya el dinero me lo pagaras cuando tu empresa comienza a dejar frutos”, de esta manera logro montar su negocio el cual prevalece con el tiempo pues ya son 18 años de funcionamiento y que cuenta con dos empleadas, Martha es una mujer soltera sin hijos que en lo único que piensa es en el bien de sus empleados y en propio por ellos solicita un crédito para la compra de una maquina plana, una maquina fileteadora y dos agujas con las que espera optimizar los tiempos de producción y generar más empleo creciendo como empresa junto con sus dos fieles empleadas a quien les debe lo que es hoy en día
texts.en:
Martha is a humble worker. She has worked as a dressmaker for more than thirty years. She says that she was lucky enough to have a good boss and thanks God* for everything he has done for her. Approximately eighteen years ago, she told her boss that she wanted to become independent and start her own company. Her boss, kindly offered her a sewing machine and told her: “take it and sell it, you will be able to buy two machines and start your business. You can pay me back when the business is up and running.”

This way, she was able to start her business, which has been running for eighteen years now. She has two employees. Martha is a single woman and has no children. She only has in mind her employees’ and her own wellbeing and this is why she is requesting a loan. She will buy a sewing machine, an overlock machine and two needles, with which she hopes to optimize her production and create more positions by expanding her business. All of this, together with her two employees, to whom she owes everything she has today. 

* Note from the translator: She probably means the Christian God.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, an overlock machine and two needles to optimize her production.

loans.name: Martha Liliana

texts.es: Martha es una chica de 24 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de los cuales un asiste a la escuela, ella es una mujer que ha demostrado tener mucha capacidad para emprender su propio negocio, y aunque todavía vive en una casa arrendada, no pierde la esperanza de llegar a tener una propia, esta persona se caracteriza por tener un espíritu de superación por ello ha solicitado  un crédito a Fodemi, el cual va a ser  destinarlo a la compra de terneros para incrementar  su pequeño negocio, su anhelo mas grande es de poder dar a sus hijos  una casa propia en donde puedan sentirse a gusto, ella es una persona muy optimista y sabe que algun día con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación lo va a lograr.
texts.en:
Martha is a young woman aged 24, who lives with her husband and their 2 children who are both attending school. Martha is a woman who has demonstrated that she has lots of capacity to manage her own business, and although she still lives in a rented house, Martha hasn't lost hope of having her own house. Martha is characterized as having the spirit to get ahead, and she has requested this loan through FODEMI. The loan will be used to purchase heifers and increase her small business.

Martha's greatest dream is to be able to provide her children with their own house where they can feel more comfortable. She is a very optimistic person and knows that one day, with much effort and dedication, she will achieve this.

loans.use: to buy calves for her business.

loans.name: Marina Elizabeth

texts.es: Marina reside  en una Provincia donde la mayoría de habitantes viven la ganadería, ella  es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 7, 12 y 14 años de edad,  el chico de 12 años asiste a la escuela y los mayores se encuentran asistiendo al colegio, Marina  se dedica a criar ganado, comenta que compra terneros y que  los cuida hasta que ve que ya están  buenos para la venta, comenta Marina que ella se esfuerza mucho por sus hijos que también se dedica al jornal para poder darles a sus hijos lo necesario y que su aspiración es que en su negocio le vaya bien cada día y que sus hijos puedan cumplir con sus estudios  y sus metas de ser unos buenos profesionales.
texts.en: Mariana lives in a province where most residents make their living raising livestock. She is a single mother of three children, who are ages seven, twelve, and fourteen. Her twelve-year-old son is in primary school and the older ones are in high school. Mariana works raising cattle. She says she buys calves and takes care of them until they are ready to be sold. Mariana says she does her best for her children and that she also works as a laborer in order to give them what they need. Her aspiration is for her business to keep going well and for her children to be able to finish school and meet their goal of having a good career.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Tassere

texts.fr:
Mr TASSERE est marié et père de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 18ans et le moins âgé a 03ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 08 personnes en charge.
Il vend du bétail  depuis plus 07ans. Il s’approvisionne  à Ouahigouya une ville du Burkina. 
Il veut s’acheter 06 moutons pour revendre.
Mr utilise ses bénéfices pour ragrandir son activité. Il ambitionne construire une maison d’habitation.
texts.en:
Tassere is married and a father of four children. His eldest child is 18 years old and the youngest is three years old. Three of the children go to school, and he has eight [additional] people under his care.

Tassere has been selling livestock for seven years. He procures the animals from Ouahigouya, a town in Burkina Faso. He wants to buy six sheep to resell.

Tassere uses his earnings to expand his business. He hopes to build a house one day.

loans.use: to buy six sheep to resell

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 54 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school, Lourdes works very hard to provide for them.

Lourdes' business was devastated by Super Typhoon Haiyan that swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Lourdes is taking out a bridge loan to restart her general store business.

Lourdes has requested PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to restart her general store business.

She is using the new loan to stock up on a variety of goods.

Lourdes is committed to rebuilding and in the future, would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, and groceries

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José tiene 65 años no estudió debido a la pobreza en la que vivía junto a sus padres, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 7 hijos de los cuales todos son mayores de edad y ya no viven con él, el vive junto a su esposa y 3 nietos, 2 de ellos estudian bachillerato y uno va a noveno grado.

José se dedica a la agricultura, sus padres se esmeraron en enseñarle este trabajo debido a que no pudieron mandarlo a estudiar, su trabajo le queda a 20 minutos aproximadamente en carreta. Y es la fuente de la cual puede ayudar económicamente a su familia y ayudarle a sus nietos para que puedan estudiar.

Con el préstamo terminara de sembrar 20 tarea de maíz y comprará 13 sacos de abono, gasolina para riegos e insumos.

El sueño de José, es sacar adelante a sus nietos que tiene estudiando para que lleguen a ser profesionales y se puedan defender en la vida.
texts.en:
José is 65 years old, and he did not finish school due to the poverty in which he lived together with his parents. He has a common-law wife, who dedicates herself to the household tasks. They have 7 children, all of whom are adults and no longer living with him. He lives together with his wife and three grandchildren. Two of them are studying for their high school certificate and one is going into ninth grade. 

José works in agriculture. His parents made an effort to teach him this profession, since they were not able to send him to school. His work is approximately 20 minutes away by wagon. This work is the source of the economic support he provides to his family and the help he gives to his grandchildren so they can attend school. 

With the loan, he will finish planting 20 hectares of corn. He will buy 13 sacks of compost, gasoline for watering systems and other supplies. 

José's dream is to help his grandchildren get ahead. He is putting them through school so that they can become professionals and be successful in life.

loans.use: to buy 13 sacks of compost, gasoline for watering systems and other supplies, to plant 20 hectares of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for her coffee crop

loans.name: José Rodolfo

texts.es:
José de 49 años de edad,  vive con sus 5 hijos de edades entre 18,14, 12, 5 y 3 años, dos de los 5 le ayudan a trabajar en la milpa en sus tiempos libres, y los otros estudian en la escuela del caserío, su esposa solo se dedica a los oficios del hogar.

José es un hombre trabajador y dedicado a su familia, actualmente trabaja en la agricultura desde que tenía 10 años, trabajando al lado de su padre que fue quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra, aparte de cultivar la tierra, también trabaja de jornalero en el mismo rubro obteniendo un ingreso más para ayudar a sus hijos.


El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar 2 quintales de urea, 2 quintales de sulfato para fertilizar el cultivo en su primera y segunda etapa. para la siembra de Maíz, También comprará media camionada de gallinaza para mezclar con el fertilizante, con esta técnica podrá darle un buen manejo al cultivo mejorando su producción y así poder tener más ingresos y también poder sacar sus granos básicos para darles una buena alimentación a sus hijos. 

José quiere seguir produciendo granos básicos, ya que expresa que es muy bonito trabajar en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Jose is 49, he lives with this five children, ages 18, 14, 12, 5 and 3. Two of the five help him to work the corn field in their free time. The others study in the village's school. His wife takes care of the housework.

Jose is a hard-working man and dedicated to his family. He has worked in agriculture since he was 10 years old, working beside his father who taught him to farm the land. Besides farming the land he also works as a laborer in the same line of work, earning an additional income to help his children.

The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of two 100lb bags of urea and two 100lb bags of sulfate to fertilize the crop in its first and second stages. For the planting of the corn, he will also purchase half a truckload of manure to mix with the fertilizer. This technique will allow for good management of the crop, improving its production and in this way increasing his income and also allowing him to extract his basic grains to give his children a good nutrition.

Jose wants to continue producing basic grains, expressing that it is lovely to work in agriculture.

loans.use: purchase two 100lb bags of urea and two 100lb bags of sulfate to fertilize the crop in its first and second stages. For the planting of the corn, he will also purchase half a truckload of manure to mix with the fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: with the purchase of agricultural supplies to help her coffee crop.

loans.name: José Mauricio

texts.es:
José de 41 años de edad,  estudio hasta noveno  grado, se casó a la edad de los  25 años, ha procreado dos  hijos con su pareja, su esposa es ama de casa, es gente muy humilde y trabajadora, viven en casa sencilla pero muy ordenada, su esposa  es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, tiene gallinas, por lo que siempre que desean un huevo no les toca comprarlo, sino solo tomarlo, tiene muy buen sentido del ahorro, los hijos ambos van a la escuela, nadie más vive con ellos.


Él es alfarero, trabaja haciendo todo tipo de material proveniente de la tierra (adobe, teja, ladillo, etc.), también cuida tres vacas que son las que le aportan también a la reducción de tanto gasto para el hogar, también se dedica a la agricultura donde obtiene el complemento de lo que se consume en el hogar, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de su casa por lo que no necesita un medio para transportarse, el horario es de las 6 am a 12.  


El proyecto que realizara es comprar semilla de maíz, abono, fertilizantes y preparar la tierra para la nueva época de siembra, ya que las lluvias ya se aproximan, la necesidad satisfecha será el poder tener el dinero para iniciar su trabajo. 

Su deseo es que sus hijos se preparen en la educación y  poderlos sacar adelante por medio del sacrificio  que incurre tener hijos estudiando, espera que su hijos se preparen para que un día sean ellos que le ayuden  en su vejez, todo esto lo logra con la bendición de Dios y su esfuerzo. Las ganancias del comercio será invertido en el pago de la cuota y en seguir trabajando
texts.en:
José is 41 years old, and he has a 9th grade education. He got married at 25 years old, and he has two children with his wife.  His wife is a homemaker, and they are very humble and hardworking people. They live in a simple but very orderly home. His wife is the one who takes care of the household work. They have chickens, therefore whenever they want eggs, they do not have to purchase them, they just have to go pick them up, which is a great way to save. Both of their children attend school, and no one else lives with them. 

He is a potter, and works making all kinds of material from the earth (adobe, tiles, bricks, etc.). He also takes care of three cows, which also help him reduce many of his household expenses. He also works in agriculture, where he is able to obtain everything that they consume at home. His work is near his home, therefore he does not need a vehicle. He works from 6am to noon.

He plans on purchasing corn seeds, manure, fertilizers, and preparing the land for the new planting season since the rains are coming soon. The need that will be satisfied by this loan is having the money to start this work. His dream is for his children to prepare themselves in school and to be able to get them ahead through the sacrifices that he must make to put his children through school. He hopes that his children will be prepared to one day be able to help him in his old age. He will achieve all of this with God's blessings and his effort. The earnings from his business will be used to pay back the loan and to continue working.

loans.use: purchase corn seeds, manure, fertilizers, and prepare the land for the new planting season.

loans.name: Soky Phan's Group

texts.en:
Soky, aged 36, lives in a rural village of the Sithor Kandal district and has two children. She and her husband are farming rice and weaving mats as their main businesses to make a living. She has been in this business for 16 years. The current business earns her about 48,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s need. 
Soky is the first cycled client with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Soky wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland and also spend on labor costs. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland and also spend on labor costs

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Norma Angelica

texts.es: Norma Angelica tiene 37 años y vive con su esposo y una hija pequeña. Ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes que inicio hace poco más de dos años. Norma se considera una mujer emprendedora y responsable, su reto es que no le falte nada a su familia. Ella esta pidiendo el préstamo para comprar mercancía para su negocio, en especial dice que van a subir los refrescos y ella quiere aprovechar antes de que suban los precios para poder seguir teniendo utilidades. Ella dice que este préstamo es una buena oportunidad para demostrar que es una mujer trabajadora y que cumple con sus compromisos.
texts.en:
Norma Angelica is 37 years old, and she lives with her husband and young daughter. She has a grocery store that she opened a little more than two years ago. Norma is regarded as a woman who is very enterprising and responsible; and her challenge is to make sure that her family lacks for nothing. 

She is requesting the loan in order to purchase merchandise for her store, mainly because the prices of soft drinks are going to rise, she says, and she wants to avail herself of the current prices before they go up, in order to continue to be profitable. 

She says that this loan is a good opportunity to show that she is a hardworking woman, and that she lives up to her commitments.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks for her store before they go up in price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two additional cows and good fertilizer for her grassland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a large quantity of sandals to sell

loans.name: Martina

texts.en:
Martina is married to a construction worker and they are blessed with four children. Her children are all attending school and are in college, high school, and elementary school. Martina hopes to see her children finish their college education and have a decent job someday. She and her husband work hard together for the future of their children. She doesn’t want her children to be like them. They did not enter college so they were not given a chance to have a job. 

At present, Martina manages a hog-raising business and sells snack foods in the afternoon and street foods in the evening. Martina wishes for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy raw materials and ingredients for her snack food business. She will prioritize her children's education through generating income from the business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and ingredients for her snack food business.

loans.name: Martiniana

texts.en:
Martiniana is 55 years old and married with six children. 

Martiniana and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Martiniana is taking out a housing loan amounting PHP 10,000 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Martiniana has been an NWTF borrower since 2012 and plans to recover through her general store.

With your help, Martiniana can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en:
Maricar is 30 years old with two children who are in school, Maricar works very hard to provide for them.

Maricar's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Maricar has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Maricar has taken a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Maricar is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future, would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Marta Elena

texts.es: Martha es una muy trabajadora mujer que se ha dedicado toda la vida a la agricultura como buena y orgullosa campesina que es, criada con los valores de una familia colombiana, humildad, respeto y alegría que reflejan  cada día al levantarse a trabajar, Martha es una optimista mujer que se caracteriza por una frase “no importa la situación a la pobreza hay que sonreír para salir de ella”. Sus negocios consiste en la comercialización de animales más puntualmente pollos y huevos con los que ha podido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar pues es una mujer soltera con tres hijos que ha entregado su ser y su alma a la crianza de estos, solicita un crédito para la compra de pollos y concentrado con los que espera aumentar su producción para generar mejores ingresos dándose una mejor calidad de vida para ella y sus tres hijos los cuales sin importar el método los convertirá en unos profesionales universitarios
texts.en:
Martha is a very hard-working woman who has devoted her entire life to agriculture.  As the good and proud country woman that she is, she was raised with the values of a Colombian family.  These are humility, respect, and joy; which she reflects upon each day when she gets up to go to work.  Martha is an optimistic woman who is characterized by one phrase, “the situation does not matter.  You need to smile at poverty in order to get out of it”.  

Her businesses consist of selling animals.  Specifically, she sells chickens and eggs.  With this she has been able to bring home the daily bread every day.  She is a single woman with three children.  She has put her heart and soul into raising the children.

She is requesting the loan to buy chickens and concentrated feed.  With these she hopes to increase her production in order to generate better earnings.  This will give her and her three children a better quality of life.  Regardless of the way, she will make them become university professionals.

loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Simón

texts.es:
Simón de 49 años de edad, vive con 3 hijos de edades entre 18,14, 12 años, dos de los tres le ayudan a trabajar en la milpa en sus tiempos libres, ya que actualmente una se encuentran estudiando en centro escolar del caserío y le es difícil ayudarle. 

Simón un hombre trabajador y dedicado totalmente a su familia, actualmente trabaja en la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años, trabajando al lado de su padre que fue quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra, aparte de cultivar la tierra, trabaja de jornalero en el mismo rubro.


Al cliente se le estará apoyando para que pueda comprar sus insumos agrícolas para la siembra de maíz, con el préstamo expreso que comprara 3 quintales de urea, 3 quintales de sulfato para fertilizar el cultivo en su primera y segunda etapa. También comprará 1 camionada de gallinaza para mezclar con el fertilizante.

Simón quiere que sus hijos estudien y tengan un buen trabajo para que se puedan valer por sí mismos.
texts.en:
Simon, who is 49, lives with three children ages 18, 14 and 12. Two of the three help him work the corn field in their free time since one of them is currently studying in the village's school and it is difficult for her to help him.

Simon is a hard-working man and completely dedicated to his family. He has been working in agriculture since he was 15 years old, working beside his father who taught him to farm the land. Besides cultivating the land, he also works as a laborer in the same line of work.

The client will be backed to allow him to purchase his agricultural supplies for the farming of corn. He has expressed that he will use the loan to purchase three 100lb bags of urea and three 100lb bags of sulfate to fertilize the crop in its first and second stages. He will also purchase one truckload of manure to mix with the fertilizer.

Simon wants for his children to study and have a good job so they can take take care of themselves.

loans.use: purchase of three 100lb bags of urea and three 100lb bags of sulfate to fertilize the crop in its first and second stages. He will also buy one truckload of manure to mix with the fertilizer for cultivating corn.

loans.name: Elsy Margarita

texts.es:
Elsy de 52 años de edad,  no tuvo ningún grado de educación, por la escases en ese tiempo de escuelas no tubo la oportunidad de aprender, la escuela más cercana le quedaba a unos 5 kilómetro de su casa , se casó a la edad de los  20 años, su esposo ya falleció, por lo que hoy le toca sola enfrentar todo lo que venga, su casa es  humilde pero se ve las ganas de salir adelante,  ella es la que se encarga de las labores del hogar, tiene gallinas y cerdos los que en gorda para posteriormente venderlos, su hijos ya son mayores de edad quienes le ayudan a ella en todo, nadie más vive con ellos.


Ella es comerciante de ganado, compra y vende, y cuando el negocio no está del todo bien se dedica a la agricultura tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseño que la vida solo se vivía bien, cuando se respeta y se hace respetar como persona que es, ordeña 2 vacas las que le producen cuaja y leche, con lo que tiene el sustento de la casa un poco seguro. Distancia que recorre es variable ya que no siempre va al mismo lugar, cuando saca la cosecha una parte la vende y lo demás para el gasto, el trabajo lo hace por la mañana de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. 

El préstamo lo quiere para mejorar la parte del piso de su casa, ya que por hoy es de tierra y está pensando ponerle ladrillo, el mejoramiento será el poder tener un lugar más digno donde vivir, 

Su deseo es que sus hijos aprendan a ser honestos y ganarse el pan de cada día honradamente, espera preparar bien su casa para cuando le toque partir, dejarles un hogar bien preparado a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elsy is 52 years old. She never attended school because of the lack of schools during that time. She never had the opportunity to learn, as the closest school was about 5 kilometers from her home. She married at the age of 20, but her husband has passed. Today, she must face every challenge on her own. Her house is humble, but you can see that she has a desire to get ahead. She is the one who takes care of the household work. She has chickens and pigs, which she fattens up in order to sell later. Her children are now grown, and help her with everything. No one else lives with them. 

She works in livestock, buying and selling them, and when business is not going well, she also works in agriculture. She has over 20 years of experience in this field. From a young age, her father taught her that one can only live a good life when you respect yourself and make yourself respected as the person you are. She milks two cows that produce curd and milk, making her daily sustenance more secure. The distance that she travels varies since she does not always go to the same place. When she harvests her crops, she sells part of it and keeps the other half for her own consumption. She works in the morning from 6am to noon. 

The loan will be used to improve part of the floor in her house as it is currently a dirt floor, and she wants to lay a brick floor. The repairs will allow her to have a more dignified place to live. Her dream is for her children to be honorable and for them to earn an honest living. She hopes to prepare her house well so that when she passes, she can leave a nice house for her children.

loans.use: to repair part of the floor of her home because it is made of dirt and she wants to lay a brick floor.

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad is a 20-year-old single young man from Gaza city. He lives with his aunt in a very small simple house. His aunt works as an employee in the public sector. This is the only source of income to the family. Imad is a student at a local university where he studies Public Relations. He is a very clever student - he wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future. 

Imad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, Imad will be able to do his homework and read articles online. Imad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Malak

texts.en:
Malak is a 23-year-old single young lady from Gaza city. She lives with her family in a very small simple house. Her mother has a beauty salon where she gets a low and unstable income. This is the only source of income for the family. Malak is a student in a local university where she studies accounting. She is a very clever student, she wants to take a BA degree and find a job in the future. 

Malak took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Malak will be able to do her homework and write the reports easily. 

Malak appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies.

loans.name: Jeanefer

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Jeanefer works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines and earns additional income from pig fattening. Jeanefer is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Jeanefer has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Magdalina

texts.en:
Magdalina works hard to support her family. Magdalina is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. It was wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan when it swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013.

To restart her business Magdalina has requested a bridge loan of 4,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional stock of items such as soap, milk, sugar, eggs and canned goods to sell.

Magdalina has been in this business for 2 years now. With your help, Magdalina will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of items such as soap, milk, sugar, eggs and canned goods to sell.

loans.name: María Magnolia

texts.es: Como a muchas mujeres en Colombia María le ha tocada ser una madre cabeza de familia, luchar por su hija sola ya que con la persona que la tuvo se marchó dejándolas abandonas, pero María sabía que tenía todas las cualidades para ejercer el papel de madre y padre pudiendo criar, mantener y brindarle todo a su hija, ya hablando laboral-mente María se desempaña como vendedora en una tienda de su hermana y añadido a esto realiza asesorías un ingreso extra que le permite cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar ya que vive sola con su hija, solicita un crédito para la compra de un local de Hello Kitty, en el que distribuirá productos como morrales, sombrillas, juguetes y artículos relacionados con este personaje ya que si hermana se ira a otra ciudad y no tendrá con quien trabajar y con su experiencia como asesora piensa que ya es tiempo de tener su propio negocio y cumplir su sueño tener una casa propia para vivir con su hija luchando cada día por el futuro de esta
texts.en:
Like many Colombian women, it has fallen to María to be a mother who is the head of the family.  She struggles alone for her daughter.  This is because the person that she had her daughter with left and abandoned them.  

However, María knew that she had all of the qualities to exercise the role of mother and father.  She has been able to raise, support, and give everything to her daughter.  

Talking about work, María is a saleswoman at her sister’s store.  In addition to this, she does consultations, which is an extra income that allows her to cover the household expenses because she lives alone with her daughter.

She is requesting a loan to buy a Hello Kitty place where she can distribute products like knapsacks, parasols, toys, and articles related to this character.  She is doing this because if her sister goes to another city, she will not have anyone to work with.  With her consultation experience, she thinks that it is now time to have her own business and to fulfill her dream of having her own house with her daughter.  She is struggling every day for her daughter's future.

loans.use: to buy Hello Kitty products.

loans.name: Dioscora

texts.en:
Dioscora is 51 years old and single.  

Dioscora's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Dioscora has restarted her family home and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Dioscora has taken a PHP 5,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Dioscora is committed to rebuild her devastated life and in future would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es:
Marcos tiene 56 años, debido a la pobreza en la que vivía junto a sus padres, se le hizo difícil estudiar, por esa situación solo pudo sacar su primer grado, su esposa es ama de casa y procrearon 5 hijos de los cuales, 2 están acompañados y tres viven con ellos, sus 5 hijos, estudiaron hasta primer año de bachillerato.  

Marcos tiene mucha experiencia en el trabajo de la agricultura,  lo aprendió de sus padres , que se esforzaron en enseñarle, es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo para sacar adelante a su familia.

Con el préstamo comprará semilla, abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas,  para realizar la cosecha de maíz, que es con la que sustenta a su familia y con la que espera sacar ganancia para cancelar el crédito y poder generar un ingresos a su hogar.

El sueño de Marcos es tener su casa propia, seguir trabajando arduamente para que a su familia salga adelante con una vida digna y próspera.
texts.en:
Marcos is 56 years old. Due to the poverty in which he lived with his parents, it was difficult to attend school, for that reason, he was only able to reach the first grade. His wife is a homemaker and they have five children of whom two are married and three live with them. His five children attended school until their first year of high school.  Marcos has a lot of experience working in agriculture, which he learned from his parents, who put a lot of effort into teaching him. He is a man who is dedicated to his work in order to get his family ahead. 

With the loan, he will purchase seed, manure, fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides to plant corn, with which he will provide for his family and with which he hopes to earn enough to pay back the loan and generate an income for his household. His dream is to have his own home and to continue working hard so that his family can get ahead with a dignified and prosperous life.

loans.use: purchase seed, manure, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides to plan corn.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio de 55 años de edad, estudio hasta un nivel superior, es profesor ya jubilado, está casado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, es quien se encarga que todo esté en orden en la casa, tienen 3 hijos, los ya no están con ellos, solo le visitan los fines de semana.
   

Con todo el sacrificio del mundo, se decidió a estudiar con méritos propios, saca un crédito para financiar sus estudios ya que sus padres no tenían como económicamente, por más de 30 años se dedicó a enseñar a muchas generaciones de alumnos, los deseos de ser alguien en la vida le motivo a querer ser alguien en la vida y obtener su sustento de una forma diferente, por hoy se dedica a diversas actividades, la agricultura, ganadería.
  

El préstamo será invertido en el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que la parte del techo está dañada y el invierno ya se avecina, lo que comprara es teja, cuartón, regla, clavos, etc. La necesidad satisfecha será el poder mejorar la vivienda ya que están importante para el núcleo familiar.

Su deseo es tener una vida tranquila donde pueda descansar, por todo el tiempo que se sacrificó trabajando, espera con la adquisición del crédito el satisfacer su necesidad de mejorar una parte de su casa.
texts.en:
Gregorio is 55 years old, and achieved higher education. He is a retired professor, and is married. His wife is a homemaker, and is in charge of keeping their house in order. They have three children who no longer live with them but visit on the weekends. With a lot of sacrifice, he decided to attend school on his own merits. He took out a loan to finance his education because his parents did not have the financial means to pay for it. For over 39 years, he dedicated himself to teaching many generations of students. His dreams of being someone in life motivated him to earn a living through different means, which is why he now works in a variety of fields such as agriculture and livestock. 

The loan will be used to make improvements to his home since part of the roof is damaged and winter is coming. He will purchase tiles, wood planks, a ruler, nails, etc.  Through this, he will be able to repair his home because it is important for his family. His dream is to have a calm home where he can rest for all of the time that he worked. He hopes that with the loan, he will be able to satisfy the need to repair part of his home.

loans.use: purchase tile, wood planks, a ruler, nails, etc. to repair part of the roof of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase products to make food and drinks such as vegetables, rice, chicken, meats.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 53 years old and a married woman with eight children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Teresita has a pig raising business in the village. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through ASKI to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Teresita has been in this business for twelve years. 

In the future, Tersita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena previously accessed a 50,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase scrap materials needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan. She will be incorporating the loan into her current revolving fund used to buy scrap and recyclable materials. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Ma. Elena hopes to have another junk shop and dreams that her whole family will always be in good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for recyclable materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Conception is engaged in a retail business selling grocery items in their village. She is 56 years old, married and has five children. Among her children, three are working abroad while others are government employees. With her status in life, Concepcion admitted that the remittances her children give her is enough to sustain their needs but she wanted to have her own source of income. 

Concepcion is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy grocery items to sell. She hopes to expand the business, and earn more. Somehow she will also help others who are unfortunate through her earnings.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to sell.

loans.name: María Elcy

texts.es: Hija de un campesino pero con un gran sentido de emprendimiento María adquirió el negocio familiar dejado por su padre quien nunca quiso invertir en esto pues decía que con lo que tenía era suficiente para vivir, no conforme con esto María comenzó a indagar y pensar cual sería la mejor manera de aumentar su producción y en que sería más útil invertir para que si nivel de ingresos aumente y hacer que le negocio familiar crezca. LA familia de maría se ha dedicado toda la vida al cultivo de plátano el cual lo distribuyen en el pueblo, y con ciertas empresas que tienen contrato. Solicita un crédito construir un canal de abono y la compra de un tractor que un vecino tiene en venta y lo está ofreciendo a muy bajo costo, todo esto apuntando a aumentar la producción y calidad de producto fortaleciendo y aumentando su parcela, demostrándole a su padre que invertir en su negocio si vale la pena y que con este podrán generar buenos recursos para tener una excelente vida como campesinos y futurizando su producto en todos los mercados de la ciudad
texts.en:
The daughter of a country man, but with great entrepreneurial sense, María acquired the family business given to her by her father.  He never wanted to invest in it because he said that what he had was enough to live on.  Not in agreement with this, María started to investigate and think about what would be the best way to increase her production.  She was also thinking of what would be the most useful investment in order to increase the level of income and to make the family business grow.

Maria’s family has devoted their whole life to growing bananas.  They distribute them in the town and to certain companies with whom they have a contract.

She is requesting a loan to build a fertilizer trench and to buy a tractor that a neighbor is selling much below cost.  All of this is aimed at increasing production and the quality of the product and to strengthen and increase her land.  She will be showing her father that investing in the business is worthwhile.  With this, they will be able to generate good resources in order to have an excellent life as country people.  She will be bringing her product into the future in all of the city markets.

loans.use: to build a fertilizer trench and to buy a tractor.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Con un amplio margen de trayectoria la señora lucia esposa del titular trabajo durante 33 años para reconocidas empresas de confección con las que tuvo muy buen éxito hasta tal punto de tener su propio negocio con 13 trabajadores pero debido a una mala racha en la cual la confección decayó y muchas confecciones cerraron por la alta competencia que ofrecían entidades extranjeras vendiendo sus productos mucho más barato. Lucia solo se quedó con las maquinas elementales, fileteadora, maquina plana , recubridora con la que junto a su esposa El señor óscar y otra empleada le confeccionan a terceros cabe aclarar que el titular de la cuenta es el señor óscar pero por su avanzada edad la señora lucia lo representa, a pesar de la avanzada edad de ambos no se conforman con su negocio quieren crecer, tener un negocio más rentable  es por esto que quieren comenzar con su propia línea de ropa, pijamas para iniciar y es por esto que solicitan el crédito para la compra de materia prima como lo es la tela y el retal para confeccionarla lo que les traerá muy buenos beneficios pues pueden vendérselos a los múltiples clientes que han conocido a través de su experiencia. El principal sueño de esta pareja de hermosos abuelos es poder dejar un negocio prospero a su generación con el que puedan alimentar a sus familias y darles una buena vida. En la foto aparecen la pareja de esposos la señora Lucia y el señeor Oscar
texts.en: With a long work history, Lucia, the wife of the business owner, worked for 33 years for well-known tailoring businesses. She had great success, even to the point of having her own business with 13 workers, but this ended due to an unfavorable period in which the clothing business suffered and many businesses closed because of the strong competition from foreign businesses, which sold their products much more cheaply, Lucia was left with the basic sewing, cutting and embroidering machines. With these, together with her husband, Oscar, and another employee, they now make clothing for third parties. It should be clarified that the holder of the account is Oscar, but due to his advanced age, Lucia is representing him. In spite of the fact that they are both older, they are not satisfied with their business: they want to expand it and make it more profitable. For this reason, they want to start their own line of clothing, starting with pajamas. Thus, they are requesting the loan to buy supplies such as fabric and remnants in order to make clothing. This will bring them excellent benefits, since they can sell these items to many customers they have gotten to know through their past experience. The principal dream of this beautiful pair of grandparents is to pass on a prosperous business to the next generation, with which they can feed their families and give them a good life. Both spouses, Lucia and Oscar, appear in the photo.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fabric and remnants to start an original line of clothing made in their workshop.

loans.name: Mirembe Nsozibiri Group

texts.en:
Judith is a married woman living in a rural area and aged 42 years. She is a member of the group above. She has 7 children and 5 are attending school in different areas. She deals in farming, growing vegetables, coffee and banana plants. She supplements her income with salary which she earns from teaching in a nursery school in her area. She started this business in 2006.

She works 6 days in a week and 12 hours per day in order to maximise resources. She started this business in order to get income to meet her family needs. She has acquired this loan to enlarge her business and to be the leading supplier of agriculture products in the village. Her clients are traders from nearby villages. 

Her future hope is to educate all her children so that they can have a better future. The challenges she faces are high transport costs, limited capital and lack of enough labourers. She is an honest and hardworking woman. She advises lenders to give loans to her clients in the required season. She will buy fertilizers to fertilize her gardens using the loan funds. Judith is the lady with a raised hand.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ma. Teresa is 49 years old and has four children who are currently in school.

Ma. Teresa's house was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her business buying and selling coconut wine and is committed to regain what she lost. Ma. Teresa is taking out a PHP 10,000 Housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build her a house for her family.

Ma. Teresa has been with NWTF since 2012 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Ma. Teresa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Rahmeh

texts.en:
Rahmeh is a 42-year-old married woman from Gaza City. She lives with her husband and seven children, five sons and two daughters, in a small simple house. She works as a teacher in a local school where she teaches Arabic. Rahmeh wants to obtain a masters degree so she can improve herself in her job.
 
Rahmeh took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her work and also for her studies. By taking this loan, Rahmeh will be able to read articles online and write the reports easily.
 
Rahmeh appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her work and also for her studies.

loans.name: Ren

texts.en:
Ren is 40 years old and married with six children. She lives in a remote area of Prey Chhor district with her husband and some of her children. She is engaged in cultivating rice for sale and earns additional income by working as a paid laborer in the region. She aims to expand her farm and increase her production in order to sustain their daily living and save some for future emergencies. 

Ren is planning to celebrate a wedding party for her child in the next few weeks, but she has become low, and she is afraid that she won’t be able to manage this well. Due to this reason, she would like to avail a loan of USD 1,000 to pay for the overall expenses of the wedding party. 

She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted to save her family on time when they are in need. She is very thankful to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to pay for the overall expenses of her child's wedding party.

loans.name: Elnara

texts.en:
Elnara is 36 years old. She is married and has two sons. Her husband is a farmer and helps Elnara in animal husbandry. She has been breeding cows and selling dairy products for ten years, and her monthly income is 500 AZN.

People have high demands in dairy products because they are very useful for health. They buy milk, cheese and butter for every day and use these products to prepare delicious things for morning. Local people prefer to buy these products from Elnara because they are always fresh and tasty. 

Elnara has a good job, but unfortunately her income doesn’t cover all the demand because she has only two cows. She applied for 1,200 AZN in order to buy three additional cows and increase the productivity and income of the farm.

loans.use: to buy three additional cows.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en: This is Laila. Her previous loan was a big help in her business, allowing her to buy more shop items. She has been in this business for years now and it keeps on growing. She would like to apply for a loan to buy more stock of household consumables, wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar. Her profits from business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household consumables, wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.en: Dionicia has two children and plans on sending them to school up to their college level of education. Her greatest dream is for them to finish their college education and become professionals someday. She also wants to see them as successful individuals in the future. Dionicia and her husband are doing their best to give a better future to their children. Her husband is a farmer while Dionicia is managing their hog-raising business. Dionicia wants to borrow a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs. She hopes to grow the business and increase her income to fully support her children's needs in pursuing their education.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of her hogs.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for her children’s education and in their personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 9,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her family’s daily needs and her children’s education expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Maricel hopes that her business will last longer and dreams that her family is always in good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
This is Angelina, 59, resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Iñigo, a security guard, and is a mother to their children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Angelina operates a house rental business. It is rented on a monthly basis. She also sells congee, a type of rice porridge, for additional income. She earns a minimum of 25,000 PHP in sales every month.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a PHP 40,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan for the repair and maintenance of her rooms for rent. 

Angelina dreams of expanding her business and hopes to be freed from poverty. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her rooms for rent.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan to purchase additional supplies of pork and chicken needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in meeting their personal, household and business expenses.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to pay for additional supplies of pork meat needed in her business. More items to sell will result in more profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her family's daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Violeta hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams to give her family a good future. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draws strength and inspiration there from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies of pork meat needed in her business.

loans.name: Varduhi

texts.en:
Varduhi is 34 years old and she lives in Dilijan city. She graduated Dilijan medical college and now she works at the Dilijan Resort rest house as a nurse. As she says, she likes her occupation very much but it is not enough to sustain her family’s everyday needs and together with her husband she is engaged in farming. On her farm, she has 2 cows, 2 calves and 2 heifers. Thanks to her knowledge of making tasty cheese, she sells from her farm cheese that she makes, milk and meat. Her husband is unemployed and helps Varduhi very much in the care of their cute farm. They have two school-aged children and they do their best to provide them with better living conditions.
 
Varduhi needs this loan since she wants to buy hay for her farm cattle and she does not have enough money to make this purchase at the moment.

loans.use: to buy hay for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cow and fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees for this semester.

loans.name: Thuch

texts.en:
Thuch is 52 years old, and has a stable home with her husband and children in the village of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. Local people are dedicated to agriculture, trading, and raising livestock. Thuch is engaged in farming rice and has managed this work with full support from her husband and children. 

Thuch has requested a loan of USD 500 to build a ladder to replace her old one which is decayed and unsafe. This will be her fourth loan with Hattha Kaksekar and first with Kiva. Thuch expresses her thanks to all of the kind lenders who offer her support.

loans.use: to build a ladder to replace her old one which is decayed and unsafe.

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity is a 27-year-old lady, married and a mother of two children, aged 6 and 3 years respectively. She operates a shoe stall in Narok town, Kenya. She has been running the business for the last five years, earning a monthly income of KES 15,000.

She has borrowed a first loan of KES 15,000 from VisionFund Kenya. She intends to use the loan to purchase more shoes for expanding her business. 

The anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for her school-going children.

Purity's dream is to improve her living standards and own a residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel says that the result of the loan for strengthening her economic activities is very positive because she buys at wholesale and increases her profit margins, which allows her to fulfill her monthly payments. Her family is healthy and provides support to continue working. 

The capital Anabel is requesting will be used to purchase oil, chicken, condiments, seasonings, beverages, potatoes, tomatoes, firewood, and propane gas to continue making fish balls and chicken balls, which are highly requested by her clients.

loans.use: to purchase  oil, chicken, condiments, seasonings, beverages, potatoes, tomatoes, firewood, and propane gas for her business.

loans.name: Asya

texts.en:
Asya is 59 and she lives in the village Tatev in the Syunik region. Asya graduated Yerevan State Agricultural University. She lives alone and perfectly manages all the agricultural activities on her land. Asya also maintains accounting records of some private enterprises, but it is her agricultural occupation, upon which she spends a lot of time and effort, that remains her main source of income. She cultivates on her land beans, potato, greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, and fruits such as apples, nuts, cherries, plums and pears. All these products, she also manages to sell at the Kapan city wholesale market. As Asya says, land cultivation is both her way of earning money and also her way of enjoying her time while being close to the land and nature.
 
Asya needs this loan amount in order to buy seeds, seedlings, and fertilizers for her agricultural activities. She has great hope of gathering a good and tasty yield that is profitable upon sale.

loans.use: to buy seeds, seedlings, and fertilizers for her agricultural activities.

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en:
Tamar lives in Gavar city which is in the Gegharkunik region. For several years, Tamar has owned her small business of clothes trading. She works at the city wholesale market in a rented stall. She sells a varied assortment of women clothes, women's and men's underwear, children's clothes, and shoes. The large number of loyal customers helps make her business profitable. She transports the merchandise from a Yerevan city wholesale market using a rented car. Tamar is married and lives with her retired husband who is a big help with the business.
She needs this loan amount to replenish her goods assortment and also to buy some new clothes for her trading business.

loans.use: to replenish her goods assortment and also to buy some new clothes for her trading business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more women's clothes to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos  de 52 años de edad, estudio hasta  2º grado dado a la situación económica de sus padres no pudo estudiar. Es madre de 4 hijos su esposo es agricultor  y solo vive con él  y un   un nieto.


 Santos se dedica a la agricultura, y a la elaboración de uniformes escolares,  la cual tiene mucha experiencia en dicha actividades ya que toda su vida se a dedicado  a dicha  profesión, ademas de la agricultura tiene una pequeña crianza de pollo. La señora  Santos todos los días se levanta a las 5:a m a darle de comer  a los pollos y luego camina unos 10 minutos para llegar donde tiene el cultivo donde trabaja junto a su esposo hasta las 10 de la mañana y por las tardes se dedica a las costuras actividades que la acompaña su nieto.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes para sus cultivos( semilla, abono y pesticidas) también comprara comida para los pollos .Ella dice que el préstamo le sera de mucho beneficio dado que podrá tener mejores cultivos de los cuales espera mejores rendimiento y obtener mas ganancias y asi poder tener mejores condiciones económicas y alimentarias.


  Los suenos de  Santos son poder mejorar su vivienda, preparar académicamente a su nieto, ya que a su hijos no les pudo dar estudio y poder seguir trabajando para que esto se le haga realidad y gracias a los créditos espera lograrlos.
texts.en:
Santos, who is 52, studied up to second grade because her parents economic situation did not allow for more studies. She is the mother of four children, her husband is a farmer and she lives with him and a grandson.
Santos works in agriculture as well as the manufacture of school uniforms. She has a lot of experience in these activities, having spent all her life in these professions. Besides the agriculture she also has a small chicken rearing operation. Mrs. Santos wakes up every day at 5 a.m to feed the chicks and then walks about 10 minutes to arrive at her crop and works with her husband until 10 in the morning. In the afternoon she dedicates herself to sewing activities, during which her grandson accompanies her.
The loan that she is requesting is to purchase fertilizers for her crops (seed, fertilizer and pesticides) and also to purchase food for the chicks. She says that the credit will be very beneficial for her, allowing her to improve her crops and expect better yields. This will allow her to earn more income and be able to have better economic and nutritional conditions.
Santos' dreams are to improve her residence, prepare her grandson academically, since she was not able to give her children an education, and to be able to continue working so these come true and thanks to the loans she hopes to achieve them.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers for her crops (seed, fertilizer and pesticides) she will also buy feed for her chicks.

loans.name: M. Saleem

texts.en:
M. Saleem owns an auto spare parts shop in the area of Lahore, Pakistan and lives near his shop. His shop is situated in the vehicle spare parts market, and it is challenging for him to sell his products with his competitors. This competition highly affects his daily sales. 

To grow his business and income and compete with the competitors, he decided to offer some additional and stylish spare parts. M. Saleem hopes that this strategy will work positively and the customers will be attracted to his new products. He cannot act upon his strategy without some capital, so he requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because BRAC Pakistan provides the facility to empower the poor. 

M. Saleem is married, and he has to look after his young children and old parents also, but he hardly spends time due to his business. M. Saleem is tension-free after taking the loan because BRAC showed him a beam of hope in the darkness. 

He is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for reselling.

loans.name: Amor Y Paz Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socias trabajadoras y luchadoras, coordinado por la señora Yessica de 25 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de 4 años de edad quién es motivo de su superación, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, leñas y verduras en su domicilio y cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo para la compra de los productos, este negocio la impulsó hace ocho años, por lo cual desea invertir en productos como es el quintal de maíz, marca o carreta de leña y verduras tales como el chayote, ayote, tomates, chiltomas, etc. Las otras socias son la señora Julia de 50 años de edad dedicada a la venta de cosa de horno y repostería, los comercializa en su comunidad, y la señora Rebeca de 25 años comerciante de maní y leña. Estas mujeres representan diversas maneras de trabajar para ganarse el pan de cada día y que a sus hijos no les haga falta el alimento.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three dedicated, hard-working members, coordinated by Yessica. Yessica is 25 years old, married and the mother of a four-year-old son who is her reason for improving her life. She sells tortillas, firewood and vegetables from home and has help from her husband for the purchase of products. She started up this business eight years ago.

She wants to invest in products such as branded corn by the quintal, barrows of firewood and vegetables such as chayote, squash, tomatoes and bell peppers. 

The other members are Julia who is 50 years old and sells baked goods and pastries in their community, and Rebeca who is 25 years old and trades in peanuts and firewood. These women represent different ways of working to earn their daily bread and so that their children do not lack food.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal, firewood and vegetables such as chayote, squash y  tomatoes

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar is a 24-year-old single man from Jabalia city. His mother works in a sewing workshop, where she gets a low income. 

Ammar is a student in a local university, where he studies business administration. He is a very clever student, and he wants to complete his studies and take a higher degree in the future. 

Ammar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester. By taking this loan, he will be able to finish his studies as soon as possible. 

Ammar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Maria de 48 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica  a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, adicional a eso también posee una panadería en el cual elabora pan francés, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el pan está hecho con material de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además tiene el mejor servicio de la zona; Maria es una mujer muy activa siempre con la mejor disposición para dedicarse a su labor, ella le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fertilizantes, abonos, control de plaga, semillas, etc. poder realizar su siembra y asi obtener un buen cultivo,  tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, 48, lives with her life partner and two children. She works in agriculture, mainly growing corn and beans. In addition, she has a bakery and makes baguettes. Lately, her customer base has grown, thanks to the good quality of the ingredients she uses,her good prices and the service she offers, which is the best in the area.

María is an energetic woman who is always willing to do a good job. She is requesting a loan at INTEGRAL in order to buy fertilizers, compost, insecticides, seeds, etc. and be able to sow. This way, she will have a good harvest. She is confident that she will be able to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, insecticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijas de 15 años y 13  años de edad. Blanca es un mujer emprendedora quien desde hace mucho tiempo trabaja como empleada en una empresa de su localidad y los fines de semana se dedica  a la venta de tortillas. Blanca desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro. Espera poder tener accesos a este financiamiento y así poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 34 years old and resides in her own home along with her life companion and their two daughters, ages 15 and 13.

Blanca is an enterprising woman who has been working a long time as an employee for a business in her town. On the weekends, she sells tortillas. Blanca wants to build a bedroom, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of bricks, sand, cement, and iron. Blanca hopes to gain access to this loan so that she can improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for building a bedroom.

loans.name: Progresando Juntos Group

texts.es: El grupo está integrado por tres socias luchadoras y esforzadas, coordinado por la socia Karla de 25 años de edad, acompañada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 5 y 7 años quienes son motivos para su superación, se dedica a la compra-venta de gallinas y de cosechas, los comercializa en el mercado de la localidad, se ha dedicado a este negocio por siete años y cuenta con la ayuda de su compañero de vida para la venta de estos productos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de quintal de purina y cosecha de jocote; esta socia con el crédito anterior impulsó el negocio de la compra-venta de cosechas, de manera que contribuyeron a la superación personal de ella. Las otras socias son la señora Rosa de 66 años de edad vende todo lo derivado del maíz y la señora Lucrecia de 50 años vende tamales, yoltamales y más derivados del maíz.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three hardworking members, and coordinated by Karla, who is 25 and is in a relationship. She is the mother of two children aged 5 and 7, who are her motivation to get ahead. Karla buys hens and vegetables and sells them at the local market. She has been doing this for seven years, helped by her life partner.

With the loan, she will buy a quintal of animal feed and jocote [a type of plum, native to tropical regions of the Americas]. With the previous loan, she started her buying/selling business, which helped her to get ahead.

The remaining members are Rosa, 66, who sells food made with corn; and Lucrecia, 50, who sells different types of tamales and other foods made with corn.

loans.use: to buy a quintal of animal feed and jocote [a type of plum].

loans.name: Casa De Dios Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socios muy trabajadores, coordinado por la socia Dasmy de 22 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de la edad de 4 años, siendo éste su mayor motivo para su superación, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de diferentes marcas entre ellas la AVON, ZERMAT, y otras, la socia solicita el crédito para la compra de productos como vanidad, pintura labial, pintura de uñas, perfumes para damas, perfumes para caballeros, desodorantes, delineador, lápiz de cejas, etc. Los otras socias son la señora  Lilieth de 24 años de edad comerciante de ropa nueva y el señor Jefry de 22 años quien elabora y vende repostería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three hard-working members coordinated by Dasmy. She is 22 years old. married and the mother of a 4 year old child who is her major reason to get ahead. She sells cosmetics of various brands like Avon, Zermat and others. She is requesting a loan to buy products like compacts, lipstick,nail polish, perfume, cologne deodorants, eye liner, eyebrow pencils. etc.

The other members are Lilieth who is 24 years old and sells new clothing and Jefry who is 22 years old who makes and sells pastries at his home.

loans.use: to buy compacts, lipstick, nail polish, perfume, cologne, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Bendiciónde Dios Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socias exitosas, coordinado por la señora Lorena de 46 años de edad y casada, se dedica a la compra-venta de cosechas y las comercializa en el mercado capitalino, en su domicilio vende nacatamales los fines de semanas, siendo este otro ingreso para ella, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosechas de papaya y mango, también invertirá en maíz, cerdo, arroz, mecate, hojas de chaguite, etc. Las otras socias son la señora Ángela de 39 años dedicada a la compra-venta de frutas y la señora Sorayda de 32 años de edad comerciante de especies en las principales calles de su ciudad.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful members, coordinated by Lorena who is 46 years old and married. Lorena makes a living buying and selling crops and markets them in the capital city street market.  Another income she has comes from selling tamales on the weekends from her home. 

The loan she is requesting is to buy papaya and mango crops, and invest in corn, pork, rice, twine, and banana leaves, etc. The other members are Ángela, who is 39 and makes a living buying and selling fruit and Soryada, who is a 32-year-old spice vendor in the main streets of her city.

loans.use: to buy papaya and mango crops.

loans.name: Los Cheles Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socias trabajadoras, coordinado por la señora Soledad de 52 años de edad, soltera y madre de dos hijos mayores de edad, se dedica a la compra-venta de verduras para comercializarlas en el mercado de la localidad, se ha dedicado a este negocio desde hace ocho años y el crédito lo requiere para la compra de verduras como es, quequisque, ayote y yuca. Las otras socias son la señora Dina de 34 años de edad comerciante de verduras en el mercado de la localidad, y la señora Katy de 22 años la quién es comerciante de verduras en el mercado de su localidad.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three hardworking members and coordinated by Soledad, who is 52 and the mother of two children who are adults now. She buys vegetables and sells them at the local market. She has been doing this for eight years now.

Soledad is requesting a loan to buy vegetables such as quequisque [a starchy root called sometimes taro root or cocoyam], ayote [Japanese pie pumpkin or pipian] and cassava.

The remaining members are Dina, 34, and Katy, 22. Both sell vegetables at the local market.

loans.use: to buy quequisque [a starchy root], cassava and ayote [a type of pumpkin].

loans.name: Fuente De Amor Group

texts.es: Integrado por tres socias trabajadoras, coordinado por la señora Francisca de 41 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 15 y 5 años que son su inspiración para su superación, se dedica a la compra-venta de frutas y verduras en el Barrio Sábana Grande, tiene 21 años de dedicarse a este negocio y cuenta con apoyo de su hijo mayor y esposo en la compra de los productos ofrecidos; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de jocote, mangos y ayote. Las otras socias son las señoras Carmen de 46 años vende repuestos de bicicletas en su domicilio y Ángela de 32 años quien ofrece repuestos de bicicletas en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This group is formed by three hard working members and coordinated by Francisca who is 41 years old, married and the mother of two children aged 15 and 5 years old. Her children are her inspiration to get ahead. She makes a living buying and selling fruits and vegetables in the Sábana Grande neighborhood, having done so for 21 years. She receives the support of her oldest child and husband to purchase the products offered. Francisca needs this loan to buy green peppers, mangos, and squash. 

The other members of the group are Carmen who is 46 years old and sells bicycle parts from her home, and Ángela who is 32 years old and also offers bicycle parts from her home.

loans.use: to buy harvests of green peppers, mango, and squash.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more supplies and materials needed in her tailoring business. Her income from business is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 19,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies of raw materials like cloth, thread, needles and other materials needed in her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and her child’s education. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Adelaida dreams to have a bigger space for her business and hopes to have a better living. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from God.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy fabric, cloth, thread and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Los Chiles Group

texts.es: El grupo está integrado por tres socias exitosas en sus trabajos, coordinado por la señora Jazmina de 31 años de edad, acompañada y madre de tres hijos de las edades de 2, 6 y 9 años, se dedica a vender zapatos y artesanías en los departamentos del país, este negoció lo impulsó hace nueve años contando siempre con la ayuda de su mamá y ahora con una trabajadora que le ayudan a la compra de mercadería, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de sandalias de mujer, sandalias para niñas,zapatos para damas, y por encargo zapatos para caballeros, también en artesanías como es cotonas bordadas, llaveros artesanales, etc. Las otras socias son la señora Hurania de 30 años la cual vende ropa de segunda en su domicilio y la señora Rosa de 21 años propietaria de una mini pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: The group is made up of three members successful in their jobs, coordinated by Jazmina who is 31 years old. She is living with her partner and is a mother of 3 children ages 2, 6, and 9. She sells shoes and handicrafts for a living in the departments of the country. She started this business nine years ago saying that she always had the help of her mother and now an employee that help her with the purchase of merchandise. She needs a loan to buy women's sandals, children's sandals, shoes for women and custom-made men's shoes. She will also buy handicrafts like embroidered shirts, craft keychains, etc. The other members are Hurania who is 30 years old who sells secondhand clothes out of her home, and Rosa who is 21 years old and owns a small grocery shop in her home.

loans.use: to buy women's sandals, children's sandals, and shoes for men and women

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos de 34 años de edad,  estudio educación media, esta acompañado su  compañera de vida se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar ,ellos tienen dos hijos los cuales estudian y viven en la misma casa con sus padres los cuales de penden de él.
