El realiza mantenimiento y reparación de equipos, estufas, electrodomésticos menores etc.  Sus ventas las realiza de contado durante todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana. Sus  principales clientes son vecinos y referidos  del sector. Su meta es organizar un  local en su casa, pero sus mayor meta es adecuar las instalaciones para ello. En la actualidad está aplicado aun credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará repuestos, de neveras, estufas, planchas y en general de equipos domésticos. Con ello ampliará su capital de trabajo y le apuntará al mejoramiento de su vida y la de su familia, trabajando cada día mas.
texts.en:
Jesus, 59, lives in southern Barranquilla with his wife and three adult children.  In order to support the household he runs a domestic appliance repair and maintenance service which he has been involved in for 40 years.  He used to work as a company supervisor but left the job and decided to become independent.  He repairs equipment, stoves, small appliances, etc.  He works every day from 8:00 a.m. and his main customers are neighbors and referrals.

His goal is to set up a shop at home but, even moreso, with the right facilities.  He is requesting a CrediKiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to buy spare parts for refrigerators, stoves, irons and other domestic appliances.  His aim is to increase his capital and improve his family's lifestyle, working harder every day.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for refrigerators, stoves and irons.

loans.name: Artush

texts.en:
Artush lives in the city of Ijevan, in the Tavush region. He is married and has a large family. His wife is unemployed, his daughter works as a salesgirl at a shop, one son serves in the army, and his youngest son is school-aged. Artush has several occupations, thanks to which he manages to provide his family with good living conditions. He provides taxi services with his car and is also engaged in swine and poultry breeding. His farm is not very rich, but it has still provided Artush for years with the opportunity to solve many financial problems for his family, to cover the costs of his children's education,  and so forth.

Artush has 5 pigs and 25 chickens on his farm. He sells a lot of eggs and meat, but he sells meat less since he has few pigs. He dreams of enlarging the number of pigs so he can sell more meat to his customers. This is why he needs this loan of 500,000 Armenian drams (AMD), as it will help him to buy several pigs and fodder.

loans.use: to buy several pigs and fodder, which will help him to enlarge his farm

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge de 21 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de productos horneados derivados de la harina de trigo. Su meta es mejorar los ingresos familiares, pero cuenta con una pequeña infraestructura que no le facilita crecer, para ello necesita fortalecer su negocio comprando más equipos y herramientas, además de insumos  y materias primas. Él como joven es muy activo y estudioso, y sueña con terminar muy pronto su carrera como ingeniero industrial. Toda su experiencia de negocio tanto administrativa, como el conocimiento de las técnicas de trabajo, las aprendió de sus padres, de quienes se independizó hace 2 años, en los cuales ha trabajado fuerte y planea aumentar la maquinaria y los equipos de trabajo, para lograr sus sueños de prosperidad. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una vitrina calentadora, un horno implementos de cocina, y hará adecuación de su espacio de trabajo y comprará tambien harina de trigo. Con ello planea incrementar su producción y poco a poco lograr sus metas de prosperidad.
texts.en:
Jorge, 21, makes and sells wheat flour baked goods.  His goal is to improve the family income but he only has a small infrastructure which does not allow him to grow.  Therefore, he needs to strengthen his business by buying more equipment and tools, as well as supplies and raw materials.  Being the active, studious young man that he is, his dream is to finish his industrial engineering degree soon.  He learned all of his administrative and technical experience from his parents, whom he became independent from two years ago.  In that time he has worked hard and wants to increase his machinery and work equipment to accomplish his dreams of prosperity.

Therefore, he is requesting a CrediKiva loan, his first through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will use to buy a heated display cabinet, an oven, kitchen utensils and fix up his work space.  He will also buy wheat flour.  His aim is to increase production little by little to meet his goals and prosper.

loans.use: To buy a heated display cabinet, an oven, kitchen utensils and to fix up his work space.  He will also buy flour wholesale.

loans.name: Benso Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des ménages monogamiques, les membres du groupe Benso ont en moyenne 41 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Kanadjiguila dans la commune du Mandé / cercle de Kati et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, d’amitié et de voisinage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce du savon, de tasses, d’habits, de condiments et du charbon de bois. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1r cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Pinda (à l’extrême droite sur la photo) a une grande réputation dans la dans la fabrication et vente du savon. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter   à Bamako une barrique de pâte d’acide, 50kg de potasse et 50kg de beurre de karité. 
Pour faire le savon, on malaxe la pâte d’acide avec la potasse et le beurre de karité, baratine ce mélange pendant plusieurs heures jusqu’à avoir une pâte consistante. On laisse cette pâte se coaguler fortement dans les moules conçues pour cette activité puis on les découpe en morceaux prêts à la vente au marché et en ambulant à une clientèle mixte. Madame Pinda espère réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 110 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité. Elle a pour objectif de pérenniser son activité dans cette relation avec Soro Yiriwaso.
texts.en:
The majority of the members of the Benso group are married women living in monogamous households. They average 41 years of age with five children each and all live in Kanadjiguila in the Mandé commune/Kati circle. They got to know each other as relatives, friends and neighbors. The group members have small businesses selling soap, cups, clothing, condiments and charcoal. They decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso in order to expand their businesses, and they are on their first group loan.

Pinda (who is on the extreme right of the photo) has a good reputation for making and selling soap. She is planning to use her loan to  buy barrel of acid paste, 50 kilos of potassium carbonate and 50 kilos of shea butter in Bamako.

In order to make the soap, oneshe has to mix the acid paste with the potassium carbonate and shea butter, then smooth out this mixture for several hours in order to have a thick paste. This paste is left to coagulate in moulds designed specifically for this purpose and then cut into pieces to sell in the market and on a door-to-door basis to a mixed customer base. 

With this loan Pinda expects to make an average monthly profit of 110,000FCFA which will be used to reinvest in her business. Her ambition is to make  her business durable through her relationship with Soro Yiriwaso.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making soap.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more goods and renovate his shop.

loans.name: Jeremiah

texts.en:
Jeremiah is a 27-year-old very hardworking gentleman, who supports a family of four. His children are of ages between nine and one year old. He has been employed in the motorcycle transport business for the last four years with a monthly income of about KES 16,000. 

He learned about VisionFund Kenya from the social media. Jeremiah has acquired his second loan of KES 112,500 which will facilitate him in purchasing another motorbike in his quest of business expansion. He is likely to earn more income due to the increased flexibility and his already established customer base.

He plans to use the proceeds to repay his loan as well as boost his savings account. He hopes to buy a taxi from his accumulated savings. He is an industrious gentleman who is determined to achieve his goal and improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, generator, and fabric.

loans.name: Kusikoyllor Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KUSIKOYLLOR”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cami Irma ella es soltera y tiene 60 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de textiles, la socia realiza tejidos en hilos y los vende en los diferentes tiendas donde venden artesanía, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender los textiles. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar hilos de colores y palitos de tejer.
 
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de ladrillos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the  “KUSIKOYLLOR” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.

The member named Cami Irma is single and 60 years old. She works in her business selling textiles. She does weavings with threads and sells them in different stores where artisanal crafts are sold. She works from  8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. She has had this business for several years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the textiles. She is asking for the loan to buy colored thread and knitting needles.
 
The other members work selling clothes, selling bricks, selling groceries, and a restaurant. 

She is grateful to those who have been a part of her dream in this way and she is committed to making the payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy colored thread and knitting needles.

loans.name: Pedro Ángel

texts.es:
Pedro de 65 años de edad,  es una persona acompañada convive con su esposa y sus hijos, estudio hasta sexto grado.
 Pedro se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa que le apoyan en la actividades agrícolas y en el ordeño de los animales que poseen. 

Pedro junto a su esposa se dedican a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  durante la mañana mientras su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y en la tarde trabaja como vigilante en una estación de bombeo de agua de su lugar de residencia.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar tres vacas que le vende un familiar y que en un futuro le producirá leche para incrementar la producción de leche. 

Pedro planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de leche,  la siembra, y del préstamo para la compra de las vacas podrá tener un mejor sustento para su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is 65 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and their children. He went to school through the sixth grade. Pedro is getting up at 5:00 a.m. His wife helps him with the farming activities and milking the animals he has.  

With his wife, Pedro farms, an activity he learned from his parents. He does this during the morning, while his wife does the housework. In the afternoon, he works as a guard in a water pump station in the community where he lives.

The loan he is asking for is to buy three cows that a relative is selling him. In the future, they will produce milk to increase milk production.   

With the income Pedro makes from selling milk, from planting and from the loan to buy the cows, he will be able to better support his family.

loans.use: to buy three cows.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es separada y tiene 5 hijos Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad. Julia es comerciante y entre las condiciones duras de trabajo es que debe viajar mucho y no puede ver seguido a su familia Julia necesita un credito para abastecerse de más mercaderia pues quiere comprar blusas para venderlas Julia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar y su marido no le ayuda en nada, por eso necesita que la colaboren
texts.en: Julia is separated and has 5 children. She lives in La Paz in a house made of brick and cement. Julia is a merchant. One of the difficult conditions of her job is that she has to travel a lot and can't see her family very often. Julia needs a loan to stock up on more merchandise because she wants to buy blouses to sell. Julia is the only source of income for her home and her husband does not help her at all. That is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to stock up on merchandise (blouses).

loans.name: Howard

texts.es: Howard es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive con sus padres en la ciudad de El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que le pertenece a su familia Howard trabaja como abogado y  necesita un credito para pagar gastos medicos para un miembro de su familia Howard es el unico que trabaja en el hogar, sus padres reciben rentas de jubilacion pero eso no alcanza, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Howard is single and has no children. He lives with his parents in El Alto city, in a house built with bricks and cement. The house belongs to Howard's family. Howard is a lawyer. He needs this loan to pay medical costs for another family member. Howard is the only one in his family who works. His parents receive a pension, but not enough for the medical fees and so need your help.

loans.use: to pay medical fees.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto es padre de dos hijos y vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Ernesto es jubilado bancario y necesita un préstamo para refaccionar y terminar la construccion de su vivienda Aunque Ernesto es ayudado por su esposa, lo que ambos ganan no alcanza, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Ernesto is a father to two children and lives in a brick and cement house in La Paz; Ernesto owns the property. Ernesto is a retired banker and needs a loan in order to finish building his house. Although Ernesto has help from his wife, the couple's earnings are not enough to pay for the work and so they need your help.

loans.use: to finish building his home.

loans.name: Eynny

texts.es: La señora Eynny tiene 37 años, casada con dos hijos de las edades de  4 y 13 años,   ella se dedica al servicio de estilismo ella ofrece sus servicios a domicilio como también atiende en su domicilio donde tiene un salón de belleza pequeño que esta iniciando,  solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales y productos de belleza para realizar su trabajo ya que tiene mucha clientela, la razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su capital de trabajo y así de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única actividad que le permite mantenerse, su deseo es tener un salón de belleza grande donde pueda brindar comodidad a su clientela.
texts.en: Eynny is 37 years old, married and has two children, aged thirteen and four years old each. Eynny makes a living as a beautician. She offers services at customers' homes and from her own home where she is starting up a small beauty parlour. Eynny is applying for this loan in order to buy materials and beauty products for her work as she has many customers. Eynny is applying for this loan in order to increase her working capital and to improve her family's quality of life. Eynny is happy and grateful to the lending institution for this support as this is her only job. Eynny's dream is to have a big beauty salon where she can comfortably offer her services to customers.

loans.use: to buy materials and beauty products.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan de 37 años de edad, es una persona casada convive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos, estudio hasta educación media. Juan se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa que le apoya en la actividades que él realiza.

Juan se dedica  a trabajar en la agricultura;  desde hace varios años oficio que aprendió de su padre y camina 4 kilómetros para llegar a los terrenos donde cultiva y trabaja durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar semilla, abono, pesticidas,etc. que necesita para  sembrar y obtener una buena cosecha para el sustento de su familia.

Juan planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de su la cosecha, podrá construirle a su familia una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Juan is 37 years old, married and lives with his wife and their two children. Juan completed up to middle school. Juan wakes up at 5 a.m. with his wife, who supports him with his work.

Juan has been making a living in farming - a trade he learned from his father - for a number of years. He walks four kilometres to arrive at the land where he grows his crops. He works all morning while his wife carries out the household chores.

This loan will be used to buy seeds, manure, pesticides and more products that Juan needs to sow his crops and to gather a good harvest to support his family.

Juan plans to use to his income from the harvest to build a decent home for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, pesticides and more products that he needs to sow his crops.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud  is a 21 year old single man from Deir El Balah.  He lives with his family in a very small house.  He works in transferring goods in the local market for the traders by buying it from the wholesalers and reselling them. 

Mahmoud took a USD loan from FATEN.  This loan will help him to buy a more products and to resell them to the local traders.  By taking this loan, Mahmoud will be able to improve his business and increase the sales.  Mahmoud appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy more products and to resell them to the local traders.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 44 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

Leah has been in this business for 6 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Ma. Helen

texts.en:
Ma. Helen is 51 years old and widowed with three children.

Ma. Helen works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from food vending.

Ma. Helen aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela works hard to support her family.  Marcela is widowed and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Marcela has been in this business for 10 years now.  She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchse additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 42 years old and married with two children.  She works very hard to provide for them.  Lucia runs a direct selling of natasha products in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell.

Lucia has been in this business for 16 years.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell

loans.name: Isablita

texts.en:
Isablita is 54 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family.  She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Isablita has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan.  She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from raising pigs and buying and selling vegetables.  She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana is a student living in Yerevan town.  She is a Kiva borrower.  Svetlana already took a loan from SEF and Kiva and was able to pay for her university costs.  She is currently asking for another loan for the same purpose: Svetlana needs a loan to cover her university tuition for this semester.
She was a very responsible payer and was very appreciative of her support from Kiva.  She hopes for lenders' support this time again and will be very glad to receive their support.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition.

loans.name: Juana Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Juana tiene 43 años, casada con dos hijos de las edades de 24 y  20 años, ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de ropa, ella vende sus productos en su puesto de venta  que se encuentra ubicado en la populosa feria 16 de Julio de la ciudad de El Alto, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la señora Juana,  va a usar este préstamo para compra de ropa al por mayor  para la temporada de invierno y así surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su mercadería, la señora Juana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando  mercadería y así de esta manera genera más ingresos económicos, se siente feliz ya agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan para crecer en su actividad, mejorara sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juana is 43 years old, is married, and has two children ages 24 and 30.  She works selling a variety of clothing.  She sells her products in her sales stall which is located in the busy market called 16 de Julio located in city of El Alto. This loan is her first with Kiva's local partner.  Juana is going to use the loan to purchase clothing in bulk for the winter season and in that way supply her business.  She is asking for this loan in order to increase her merchandise.  She has faced some challenges in her business, including competition, and she plans to use her loan in order to continue purchasing merchandise and in that way generate more income.  She feels happy and thankful for the opportunity being offered to grow her business and to improve her income, which will help improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for the winter season.
